title: Lucky Reading Podcast

Hello! This is Lucky Reading Podcast, a process piece! In this podcast, hosts J and T talk together/vamp about what they're currently reading—books, articles, wall texts, soap bottles, street signs, t-shirts? and other media—especially if they haven't yet finished reading.

Hosts J (J F K Randhawa) and T (Teo Rivera-Dundas) are multi-disciplinary artists currently based in Los Angeles, CA. They are the founders and co-editors of rivulet, an experimental literary arts journal (in print, and online at www.rivulet.net).

title: Cultivating & Integrating Literacy Across the Curriculum
description: Literacy and its cultivation is the key to education in the 21st Century.  We say that THOSE WHO READ, SUCCEED and that has never been more important than it is today.  From the earliest grades, we need to encourage literacy which today means more than just being able to read and write. It means being able to understand and apply what we read to our own lives and the world around us.  We live in an increasingly global, technologically driven world and our young people need to be able to make sense of that world through all variety of reading, online and off.  I hope to contribute to your successful literacy program and to the advancement of literacy not just in the classroom but out of it as well, in the homes of our students.  Therefore, there will the oral reading of books for children to listen to and think about.  There will be ideas for how parents and teachers can use the books I read as well as many other, to advance knowledge of the world.  Plus there will be ideas on how to enrich your literacy program and help your students indeed make applicable, those who read, will succeed.

title: Arch Street Meeting House: Untold Stories in Quaker History
description:
Quakers have and continually help shape the definition of freedom by actively standing at the forefront of major reform movements in American history, including abolition, African-American history, women's rights, prison reform, making education and healthcare available to all, and temperance.

Join Denis Long each month as he interviews educators and historians on how Quakers have made long-lasting impacts on history. Each episode explores the untold stories of Quakers, shedding new light on the Quaker history narrative.
author_name: Arch Street Meeting House Preservation Trust

title: הפודקאסט של עמרי פלד
description: קשה הלבד הזה. בדרך כלל אני טוב איתו אבל אז מגיע יום של חורף באמצע הקיץ ואני חוזר לנקודת ההתחלה. יש לי בארון יותר מידי קפוצ׳ונים שאני לא לובש וכל פעם שאני בא לסדר, קופץ לי לראש הרגע שהיא יוצאת מהמקלחת עם שיער רטוב, לוקחת מהארון את הקפוצ׳ון הירוק של גאפ שלא לבשתי שנתיים ובאה להתכרבל מול הדוקו של איימי שבמילא ראינו כבר שבע פעמים. שמונה אם סופרים את הדייט הראשון. בא לי להתאהב כבר ברור שבא לי. אין לי כח יותר לעמוד שעה וחצי בפקקים רק כדי לחזור לדירה ריקה. בא לי לכתוב מכתבי אהבה למישהי אחת, נמאס לי לכתוב אותם לכל העולם. העולם לא יבין. הוא לא יכול להבין. אבל אז ברגע האחרון של היום אני מתעשת, מדליק את הקטורת שעל השולחן, לוקח דפדפת שורות צהובה ומבין שאם אני עדיין לבד כנראה יש לי עוד שיעורים לעבור עם עצמי, יש לי עוד פרקים לכתוב ביומן. אני מתעשת ומבין שאני לא מאשר לעצמי לקבל את האהבה הזאת מבחוץ, כי אני עדיין לא אוהב את עצמי מספיק מבפנים. עדיין.

title: Interface, Audio Chapters
description:
Welcome to the World-City of Thousel, the sixth iteration of life on the planet. These are the recordings of the people of Thousel. Thousel is believed to be the second longest iteration of life, and the overall most prosperous compared to what we know about the past five iterations. Medicine and technology have all progressed abundantly, and the world itself has been turned into one great city, governed and managed by the Governmental-Company Alliance, or the GCA. 

These particular recordings concern the discovery of a peculiar machine. When two very different people find themselves bound by the fate of one mysterious bot, life in the World-City begins to change...
A more detailed trigger warning can be found with each written chapter on the main site. As a general rule of thumb, this story should be considered content for mature audiences. Violence is abundant throughout the world of Thousel, and multiple characters regularly deal with very real mental health struggles that could be triggering for readers. There will be graphic language (both fictional and real-world) and descriptions of altogether not-very-happy scenes.

Interface is a webnovel written by iwriterobots. You can read the story at iwriterobots.com, or listen to the audio chapters on spotify. Audio chapters are read and recorded by Henry Hales. If you like the show, consider supporting the production of the story and audio chapters under the support tab at the main site, iwriterobots.com.

title: Crow Club: A Shadow and Bone and Grishaverse Podcast
description:
Three friends dive into the world of Shadow and Bone and the Grishaverse, discussing everything from our favorite characters to implications of the worldbuilding, and back. Discussions will include spoilers for all of the Grishaverse! 

Cover art photo by Kevin Mueller on Unsplash

title: Living Room Conversations
description:
Welcome to the LIVEforward Institute's Living Room Conversations Podcast!

Conversations fuel ideas, giving them a new dimension and fully coming alive from a place of resonance and connection. We have seen the catalytic power of conversations in the work that we do, as well as the impact that it brings to the world. 

As our way of launching ourselves into this virtual space, we open our Living Room to the people who have inspired us and who continue to explore, shape and move the needle for a better future of work (and society as a whole).

Our Living Room Conversations create a space for us to connect, to explore thoughts and learnings, in a relaxed and very human way. To our listeners, we give the opportunity to candidly eavesdrop and chime in to one of the many interesting conversations around the space of teal, agile and the future of work. To our guests, we look forward to an engaging dialogue and resonance, that brings a breath of fresh air to the space we occupy.

title: Glasser Series Audiobooks - A Death Worse Than Dying
description:
Draper’s Girl is attempting to fall off the grid, but time off or ‘personal time’ doesn’t exist within the Organization. Additionally, her secret sabbatical and therapy sessions are working … bringing up long buried memories and horrors of her childhood. With a trove of data she’s acquired from Draper, she flirts with the idea of Accelerating - the method Jack Glasser uses in his research - in an attempt to make sense of it all.
 
Concurrently, Amin suffers a devastating loss in Atlanta, pulling in Luke, Chas and Quan in an attempt to unravel two mystery deaths. Slowly and painfully, they peel back layers of a larger conspiracy to defraud a church … a plan crafted by Organization members.
 
When Draper’s Girl’s trail leads back to Atlanta as well, once again she finds her fate intertwined with the Glassers and their employees. For Amin and Draper’s Girl, closure seems distant, but with each body that drops, they come closer to the truth.

title: Little Sleep//Much Reading
description: Aliza and Marissa are two Creative Writing Grads from Pratt Institute who LOVE books! Pratt gave us years of experience discussing books and being able to really identify the things we like or don't like. Our goal each week is not to find super amazing books we absolutely love, although that would be a nice treat. Our goal is to present new books to our listeners (and oftentimes ourselves) that they may not have had the opportunity to know about. Of course, we will throw in popular titles sometimes and keep up with the trends, because at the end of the day, we really just want to talk about Books! So join us weekly to discuss two new titles, maybe you'll discover something new, or maybe we will open your mind about an old favorite, either way we would love to have you!

description: Good Friday. 1917. The front lines of The Great War. Hell unleashed. A biblical scale armageddon, sparked by the horror of the conflict, ends the war and begins to consume the world. Demons rise. They take possession of the slain and hunt humanity, like an army of serial killers, exacting retribution for mankind’s sins. A disparate group of survivors—soldiers and civilians from all the warring nations—bands together and seeks sanctuary, while their pasts come to life and force them to face the reckoning for their sins. title: The Dark Volumes Podcast

The Dark Volumes podcast brings you monthly stories from the greats such as H.P. Lovecraft, Edgar Allan Poe, Mary Shelley, Robert Chambers, and others. There's some commentary, sure, but it's all about the stories, here.

Turn off the lights, pour some wine, and (maybe) get under the covers. The Dark Volumes are here to remind you why you should be afraid of the dark.

title: Please Expand
description:
Please Expand is a podcast where I discuss non-fiction books with their authors. But Please Expand is not just about summaries; it's about conversations. I go into every episode having read each book in great detail and having reflected on the fundamental assumptions, foundations and questions with which the book grapples.
If you, like me, have finished a book with burning questions that only the author could answer, then Please Expand is the podcast for you.
Pick up one of the books I'm discussing and settle in for what I hope will be an illuminating conversation.

title: The Fantasy and Sci-fi Fanatic's Podcast
description: Do you love fantasy? Do you crave sci-fi adventures? Is writing a hobby of yours? Then the Fantasy and Sci-fi Fanatic's Podcast is the podcast for you! If you have a suggestion of someone you would like to see interviewed, please email me at scholarsofuma@gmail.com.

title: Bonded Books Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Bonded Books Podcast where we discuss books, fight over book boyfriends, and the lack of filter is a family trait. If you’re lucky you might even hear one of our dogs barking in the background. Because hey, if we have to deal with them then so do you. We hope to dazzle you with our discussion, while not being hurtful to the authors we feature. Success not guaranteed. 

We are a mother and daughter duo who love to read and discuss books! We are unashamed in our love of escaping reality by flinging ourselves into the arms of book boyfriends at any given moment. On Bonded Books we'll discuss our combined love of vampires, shifters, aliens, fae and more! Stop by for a listen, your TBR list will thank us!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook @BondedBooksPodcast. You can also join our Facebook Group: The Parlor.

title: Lone Mama Book Club
description: Lone Mama Book Club is a positive community created to unite women and mothers. Motherhood can be so many things at once: beautiful, heartbreaking, joyful, frustrating, unifying, and isolating. This club was created to build a community amongst book loving moms and pave the way for us to discuss some great (and maybe not so great) reads. The books chosen for the club focus on coming of age, womanhood, and motherhood. My hope is that this community will help make even one fellow mama not feel so alone. Although all our journeys may look different, we are all in this together.

title: Restoration Fellowship Podcast
description: Dedicated to recovering the beliefs of the first-century disciples of Jesus, the Messiah. Sound theology begins with the creed to which Jesus subscribed in Mark 12:28-29 — the creed of Israel (Deuteronomy 6:4) — and God's Gospel about the Kingdom (Mark 1:14-15).

title: slobodnim stilom
description:
U ovom ćemo podcastu slobodnim stilom razgovarati s gostima ili sami o stilistici, njezinim najpoznatijim granama, književnoj i lingvističkoj stilistici, kao i o primjenjivosti stilistike kao discipline na različitim tekstovima i suradnji s drugim disciplinama, poput retorike, semiotike, sociologije, fonetike, analize diskurza itd.
Na kraju svake epizode naši će gosti odgovarati na sedam pitanja i tako ostaviti svoj stilski potpis. Zanimat će nas najdraže stilske figure, koji biste novi interpunkcijski znak predložili, koju pjesmu znate recitirati napamet, koju pjesmu biste voljeli naučiti recitirati, da se možete izražavati samo jednom vrstom riječi, koja bi to bila, za koju hrvatsku riječ smatrate da je neprevodiva, predložite novu riječ koja označava kakav osjećaj, a koja nije dijelom hrvatskoga rječnika.
Moderatorice:
slobodnim stilom s gostom - Gabrijela Bionda
slobodnim stilom od A do Ž - Iva Antičević, Ana Žagmešter
Kontrasti - Ana Juradin, Helena Lučić
Književni složenac - Petra Kober, Veronika Vrgoč

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slobodnimstilom
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/slobodnim.stilom/
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/slobodnim-stilom

title: Chemin de Vérité
description:
Bienvenue dans ce nouveau podcast intitulé Chemin de Vérité. C’est ici où on essaie de laisser tomber toutes nos idées préconçues sur la Bible, afin de parvenir à la seule vérité de Dieu. 

Nous vous rappelons que vous pouvez nous écrire avec vos questions à questions@chemindeverite.com , alors n’hésitez surtout pas à nous contacter !

Où que vous soyez, quel que soit votre niveau de connaissance de la Bible, on vous invite à cheminer avec nous !

En savoir plus: https://www.chemindeverite.com/

title: Historias de Mujeres Empresarias
description: Pocos esfuerzos se han dedicado a describir las vidas de las mujeres talentosas, activas y creativas en Sinaloa, es por eso por lo que el objetivo general de este libro es rescatar historias de mujeres empresarias en el contexto de este estado y contarlas a manera de narrativas y relatos biográficos, para resaltar sus experiencias personales, aprendizajes, decisiones, errores, estrategias y las peripecias vividas en su cotidianidad y en su quehacer empresarial. Estas historias también tienen el objetivo subliminal de llegar a ser evidencias históricas de las realidades de las mujeres, en la época que les ha tocado vivir y desarrollar su empresa.

title: Ενσυναίσθηση - Σε μια κοινωνία που δεν ξέρει να πενθεί
description:
Το πόνημα αυτό δεν είναι ένα κλασικό βιβλίο που θα σε κτυπήσει φιλικά στον ώμο και θα σου πει ότι «όλα γίνονται για κάποιο λόγο», «ο Θεός παίρνει τους καλούς», «τουλάχιστον τον έζησες και τον είχες κοντά σου για αρκετά χρόνια» και άλλα τέτοια. Δεν θα σου πει ότι αυτό που περνάς θα γίνει σύντομα πιο ελαφρύ ή θα το ξεπεράσεις. Ούτε θα προσπαθήσει να σε κάνει να νικήσεις το πένθος σου λες και είναι κάποια αρρώστια. Δεν θα επιχειρήσει να ανάγει ένα τραγικό γεγονός σε κάτι ανώτερο και να το εξηγήσει μεταφυσικά ή από θρησκευτική σκοπιά. Θα σε στηρίξει στο να ζήσεις με το πένθος σου, να το καταλάβεις, να συμφιλιωθείς με αυτό και να περπατήσετε μαζί στο νέο άδικο μονοπάτι που σε έβαλε η ζωή. Μια ζωή που δεν έχει λογική και όπου το σύμπαν δεν ανταμείβει τους καλούς, ούτε τους προσέχει, ούτε τους χρωστάει τίποτα. 
Στις 27 Δεκέμβρη του 2020, έχασα τον πιο σημαντικό άνθρωπο της μέχρι τότε ζωής μου αλλά και της μετέπειτα. Κατέρρευσαν τα πάντα και ένα πανέμορφο εσωτερικά κορίτσι 36 ετών μόνο, έκλεισε τα μάτια και δεν τα ξανάνοιξε . . .

https://www.instagram.com/euterpe996/

title: LA JEFA ERES TÚ
description:
El canal que empodera y da visibilidad a la mujer.

Olga Jiménez comparte claves sobre productividad, organización, ventas, liderazgo y motivación entre otros.

Además, el canal cuenta con invitadas del mundo de los negocios, el deporte, el arte, la moda, la cultura, el emprendimiento y mucho más.

Olga Jiménez es experta en ventas, motivación y liderazgo, empresaria y autora.

Desde el año 2002 ha liderado a miles de mujeres en el sector de la venta directa de alta cosmética, logrando las posiciones más altas y los mayores reconocimientos.

Ha sido invitada como mentora en distintos puntos de España, Europa, Estados Unidos y Latinoamérica.

El estilo de comunicación de Olga es tremendamente inspirador, positivo y empoderador.

Ganó su primer millón antes de los treinta y actualmente su negocio factura alrededor de seis millones de euros anuales.

Su primer libro LA JEFA ERES TÚ, se ha posicionado en el puesto número de 1 de AMAZON más de 40 veces desde su lanzamiento. Además, ha aparecido en Business Insider como uno de los 7 mejores libros de liderazgo femenino junto a los de Melinda Gates y Ana Botín.  

Desde enero de 2022 es conductora del programa de radio semanal “LA JEFA ERES TÚ El programa que empodera y da visibilidad a la mujer” en RKB BARCELONA 106.9FM.

Ella cree en un concepto holístico de la mujer de negocios para quien el triunfo profesional sea la llave para una vida personal todavía más exitosa.

A través de su libro, canal, podcast, conferencias y programa de radio te mostrará cómo lograrlo.

Instagram: @lajefaerestu

title: The Dark Matter Myth Podcast
description:
The Dark Matter Myth Podcast, is a triple entendre, play on words. We raise issues that are thought to be of circumstance, but are usually a subconscious, dark afterthought to most people. It also draws inspiration from a concept of the astrophysics field called, Dark Matter.

The Dark Matter phenomenon is only observable by it's pull on nearby objects. While it isn't observable on the visible light spectrum, it's presence is calculated to consist of a significant majority of the entire universe.

In short, the majority of the universe is filled with experiences and circumstances that you will never see. And it all remains a myth until the majority of people believe it to be true. And the only way to do that is to give them the information while they're still.... Receptive.

So come and enjoy this fusion of HipHop, philosophy, street smarts, science and history.

For people without the comic book, Episode 9 is a great place to start. Anything before this is a bit unpolished, but still worth listening to.

This podcast began centered around discussions following the provocative comic book series and corresponding audio works By Jean Kyle R.

The first episode is much different from any of the latest episodes. So if you don't have it, start at episode 9.

The Dark Matter Myth Series is available at: http://www.DarkMatterMyth.com Purchase our two issue collection today for only $7.13. You won't regret it. Also available at Google Books...& Amazon Kindle.

http://linktr.ee/JR.Media https://www.instagram.com/jr.media.comics/ http://mailto:Jr.Media.comics@gmail.com https://www.tiktok.com/darkmatter_comics.media

works By Jean Kyle R available on popular platforms https://music.apple.com/ar/album/the-dark-matter-myth-die-young-trapped-ep/1630147258?l=en The adjacent, precursor, free mixtape to this project: https://soundcloud.com/trevaughn-k-ramiro/sets/dmm-2?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing

title: Here by the Owl (audiobook)
description: At the height of WWII, the United States plucked nine farm boys from across the country and sent them to a remote island in the Atlantic Ocean for what was designated a "special mission." Here by the Owl is the untold true story of one of those farm boys, a native of the Blue Ridge Mountains named Robert Gray Shipley. While his pregnant wife Agnes is struck with a deadly illness back home, Shipley struggles to understand the horrifying reason why the leaders of the military have made his mission so vital. This full-length audiobook, performed by the author, uses interviews, historic newspaper and magazine articles, long-lost letters, and records from the National Archives to tell a true story of love, loss, and a forgotten Air Force mission that changed the world.

title: The Bookworm Podcast with Perfectá
description:
Welcome to The Bookworm Podcast! New episodes are uploaded every Thursday.
From hot takes on your favourite books to recommendations and trending topics in the book community. So grab your tea, sit back and tune in.

title: J Hirtle The Last Storyteller
description: Poet and storyteller J Hirtle began his writing career with the book "Going Numb", a story about addiction, and faith. Writing the book rekindled his life-long love of writing. Storytelling. His stories and poetry cover everything from faith, addiction, history and love...in other words...life.

title: WTMY! | Wise To Meet You!
description: Wise To Meet You! (WTMY!) gaat verder dan een 'Nice to meet you!'. We gaan verder dan het normale, beleefde praatje en het liefste praten we direct over wat relevant en belangrijk is. Wat mag best eens gezegd mag worden of naar gevraagd mag worden? Dat bespreken we graag. We willen weten wat de personen die we interviewen motiveert en hoe zij tot hun visie zijn gekomen. De gesprekken gaan in de kern over vrijheid en we nodigen je uit om samen met ons te luisteren naar elkaars ideeën hierover en er ook over in gesprek te gaan met je omgeving.

title: S&K Library
description:
Do you enjoy talking about your favorite books? Do you just want to rave about what's going on in the amazing fictional or non-fictional world you've deep-dived into, but no one can relate? We feel the same way! 

Join avid reader Spencer and English teacher Kristi as we start our marriage making each other read some of our favorite novels. We'll discuss, argue, and rant about our favorite literary moments in this monthly podcast.

You can visit our website for more information at https://sites.google.com/view/sklibrarypodcast/home

title: The Golden Crane
description: A podcast about the Wheel of Time book series. A weekly journey through the books by new reader guests and a Host who has finished the series.

title: The Sorry Not Sorry Generation
description:
Join us 90s millennials as we rip apart our childhood
Sit back, relax, and enjoy the ride

title: Shelf-Medicating
description: Shelf-Medicating is a happy hour meets book club podcast hosted by four best friends. Each month we release one Happy Hour episode and one Book Club episode. Our Happy Hour episodes are full of random discussions, current favs, and life updates. Our Book Club episodes focus on a single book that was picked by our Instagram followers. We discuss our likes and dislikes and give an overall rating. Thank you for listening, and trusting us to help you shelf-medicate.

title: Dad Lit
description: If it has at least one submarine and one helicopter, it's Dad Lit. Join hosts Chris and Connor as they explore Dad Lit classics by authors such as Tom Clancy, Clive Cussler, and Lee Child, as well as some of the genre's more obscure titles. Book reviews, author deep dives, interviews, and more.

title: Гласът на нашите корени
description:
Гласът на нашите корени е подкаст канал, който представя по артистичен, приятен и интригуващ начин известни литературни текстове, голяма част от тях включени в задължителната учебна програма. Текстовете са преплетени с песни събирани по време на нашите етнографски експедиции с цел създаване на една пълнокръвна образност на съдържанието. За основа на всеки епизод използваме един от спектаклите на театрална лаборатория Алма Алтер. Текстовете ще се изпълняват от актьори от Алма Алтер под режисурата на Николай Георгиев. Всеки месец от годината очаквайте по един епизод: 
Януари - “Албена” по Йордан Йовков
Февруари - “Последна радост” по Йордан Йовков
Март - “Житие и страдания грешнаго Софрония” по автобиографичния разказ на българския духовник и будител Софроний Врачански
Април - “За бащата и за братята”, за живота и идеалите на братята Христо и Евлоги Георгиеви
Май - “Часът на моето убийство”, за живота и делото на  Стефан Стамболов  по романа на Христо Даскалов
Юни -  “Дядо Йоцо гледа” по Иван Вазов
Юли - “По-добре да бъдеш недоволен човек отколкото доволна свиня” по Алеко Константинов
Август - “Септември” по Гео Милев
Септември - “Що е отечество” по текстове на Гео Милев
Октомври -  “Гаврошовци и котета разбойници” по текстове за деца на Гео и Леда Милеви, 
Ноември -  “Маргарита и Майстора” по романа на Михаил Булгаков
Декември - “Мъртвият Дом” по едноимения роман на Ф. М. Достоевски Записки от мъртвия дом. 
Преди всеки епизод ще има и кратък разговор със създателите на епизода, които в един интерактивен диалог ще извеждат основните послания на текста и мостовете му с днешната действителност. Приятно слушане!
Дейностите по проекта "Гласът на нашите корени" отразяват единствено гледната точка на автора и Комисията не носи отговорност за използването, по какъвто и да било начин, на съдържащата се в тях информация.
Проектът се реализира с финансовата подкрепа на Европейски корпус за Солидарност към Европейски съюз

title: Booklyn Calling

Booklyn Calling amplifies diverse voices within the artists’ book field and explores artmaking as a tool for community engagement, education, and social justice work. Hosted by Monica Johnson & Marshall Weber of Booklyn, Inc., a nonprofit arts organization located in Brooklyn, NY. Theme music by Kaia Fischer and Stuart Gunter. Artwork by Mylo Mendez. Sound recording and editing are provided by Earbong & Radio Free Brooklyn, a community organization providing a freeform radio platform for the diverse cultures that comprise the borough of Brooklyn.

Booklyn Calling is made possible in part by funds from the New York City Department of Cultural Affairs, in partnership with the NY City Council.

title: Beginning

title: 齊聽書
description:
由香港青年協會賽馬會Media 21媒體空間主辦，語文教育及研究常務委員會（語常會）支持及語文基金撥款，《全港校園導讀比賽》2021/23 廣邀中小學學生參與，期望透過活動提高學生閱讀興趣，並學習「疫」境自強精神。M21藉此開設「齊聽書」頻道，邀請不同界別人士及學生聲演正面價值和勵志故事，以聲音感動聽眾，透過聆聽故事提高抗逆能力，加強正面思維。「齊聽書」頻道的故事由多間出版社提供書籍，包括新雅文化事業有限公司、三聯書店、蘋果樹圖書公司、木棉樹出版社、香港青年協會專業叢書組。

有關本活動的詳情請瀏覽m21.hk/audiobook/2021/ 及 m21.hk/audiobook/2022/

為表揚參賽者和得奬者的表現，並向公眾人士推廣閱讀，M21於比賽完結後，將上載得奬作品及優秀作品於齊聽書頻道，讓各界人士聆聽書本內容。

title: Read, Watch, or DNF
description:
Are book-to-screen adaptations always trash? Probably. Mel B. & Jackie D. are on a drunken mission to find out. In the pursuit of science and booze, we put the saying "the book is better" to the test. Each week one of us will read the book while the other watches the movie or show, then we'll swap and come together to break it all down - drunkenly. So join us for your favs, or maybe discover some new ones while we read and watch, so hopefully, you won't have to DNF.

https://readwatchdnfpodcast.start.page

Check out one of our besties for book recs & reviews, especially if you're in the mood for something a lil...different :)

https://linktr.ee/bonthewitch

title: Literatura gelatinosa
description:
En este espacio habrá conexiones húmedas en torno a la literatura. ¿Qué tiene que ver Platón con Fey, o la portada de un cereal con Mary Shelley? 

Los tentáculos literarios están ocultos entre nosotros; es cuestión de saber buscar.

title: Literally Delicious Podcast
description: Hello, food nerds! Every week, we take a deep dive into some delicious dishes (and drinks) from classic works of literature. By exploring historical documents, recipes, and cookbooks, host Nick will take you into the culinary world of great fiction, making the same food enjoyed by some of literature's most beloved characters. With a new recipe in hand, Nick then takes you into his kitchen where he tries his best to make the narrative nosh as close as he can to the original.

description: Andy and Steven take a tour of the entire New Universe, Marvel comics' huge undertaking in 1986 when Jim Shooter, Tom DeFalco, Mark Gruenwald and Archie Goodwin worked together to create a brand new comics universe and launched 8 new comics.

title: Reading With Christine Figs
description:
Hello everyone! I'm Christine and while I've been reading my entire life, I really picked up a passion for it in my early twenties and haven't looked back. On this podcast you can hear me talk about my recent reads and whatever art I am currently feeling inspired by, because as we all know, it is art in it's many forms that can heal us, hold us, and most importantly, give us hope when we need it most.

Shop: https://bookshop.org/shop/readingwithchristinefigs 
Contact: ReadingWithChristineFigs@gmail.com

"ILoveRSS"

title: Voz
description:
Voz es más que un poema, es un grito a la libertad y el amor por toda la humanidad.

Poetas del Pueblo

Las motivaciones que predominan en mi, para escribir, son unos fuertes sentimientos de libertad, solidaridad, respeto y amor por todo lo que tenga vida. Toma mi poesía, si no te gusta deja la ir. Si te agrada, llámame, te regalare mi voz. Nací en un pueblo costero al sur de Andalucía, mis inquietudes y mi forma de ver la vida me pusieron siempre al lado de la lucha por las libertades. 
El grueso de los poemas que en esta página se recitan, son de mi autoría, hago también podcast de poesía, recitando poemas de autores de habla castellana, o no, con la particularidad de que recitaré, principalmente  a los poetas Andaluces, excepción de varios de los mismos, al tener que recitar a poetas andaluces, el formato será distinto. El léxico cambia considerablemente, espero lo disfruten al igual que yo, haciendo este trabajo.

title: Entre 2 cases
description: Animé par Jean-Dominic Leduc, ce balado vous propose de longs entretiens avec différents acteurs du milieu du 9e art Québécois. 24 épisodes (2022-2023)

title: Twisted Reality
description: Telling Stories in a Unique way

title: Bookstore Bees
description:
Welcome to our new podcast! We are 3 friends who love to read, and we want you to join our bookclub!

Each month we will be voting on a title to discuss, and posting our discussions here! There will also be inevitable discussions about our other reads, current trends, and our recommendations. 

(Disclaimer: Though we do all work at a bookstore, our views are our own and are in no way affiliated with the store or any authors/publishing houses/etc.)
author_name: Rose Culver, Steph Pelham, and Amy Todd

title: المعارف الحكميّة بودكاست

title: Good Luck
description: È tumultuosa la vita di Anvil. Sono tante le situazioni che a soli diciassette anni deve fronteggiare: i problemi a scuola, le liti con gli amici e le gigantesche aspettative che i genitori ripongono in lei. Un giorno, però, qualcosa stravolge completamente la sua esistenza: un ciondolo di colore blu. Un talismano che la aiuta, le fa compagnia, la salva dai pericoli; seppur non si manifesta mai, è sempre presente, tanto da sembrargli un amico, a cui lei attribuisce il nome di Nazar. Quando per Anvil la presenza di Nazar diventerà un ricordo, i due si ritroveranno di nuovo legati grazie ad una lettera. Qualcosa di bello accadrà. Proprio nel modo in cui lei smetterà di aspettarlo. Ascolta l'audiolibro integrale di "Good Luck" narrato da Sheila Rosati. C'è un mondo che ti aspetta... Sheila Rosati Copyright © 2022

title: Between The Sheets
description:
Welcome to Between the Sheets - a place where we dish weekly about all things books and relationships.  We dive deep into popular books and intertwine conversations around building confidence, sex, and overcoming shame.

Getting a little freaky doesn't have to be something we keep just between the sheets. 
Hosted by 
Denise (@withlovedac) 
Kels (@litpls) 

Follow us on IG: @kdbetweenthesheets

بشو هر آنچه که هستی
.

title: Da el salto
description: Jesucristo te invita a seguirlo más allá de lo que se ve posible. Sus enseñanzas te llevan a un risco. Ahí ves que la fe no se trata de estar de acuerdo con Cristo sino de hacer lo que Él dice, inclusive si esto implica tomar un riesgo: «toma tu cruz», «vende todo lo que tienes» y «saca tu ojo». ¡Estas cosas son audaces! Y serán lo mejor que has hecho nunca. Que este audiolibro te anime a dar el salto.

In each episode we foray into the lives and loves of our favourite characters, a book's themes, ideas, and the writing itself. Then we conclude with a segment on TV, where we gossip about the shows we’ve been watching.

title: The Et Omnia Trilogy: Adahy
description:
Join author Justin Eggen as he reads "The Et Omnia Trilogy: Adahy". Each episode will contain a chapter from the book. This is effectively an audio book. 

In the summer of 1773, Adahy embarked in search of his father's blood brother Major Thomas Young of Boston, per his mother's dying wish. Equipped with a beautiful black mare named Raven and an arsenal of weapons with the skill set to wield them, he quickly finds the atmosphere across the thirteen colonies is not how he remembered in his youth. The quick-tempered half-native, half-English young man encounters friends, enemies, lovers, drunkards, and powerful elites on his fortuitous journey. Soon he inadvertently uncovers the truth about his past and the ominous secrets history has hidden away from civilization.

title: Do Everything with Love Podcast
description: Welcome to the Do Everything withLove podcast. Hosted by Waddy, Myron, Amber, and David. We are a community - learning growing and engaging dialogue around topics relevant to today’s culture and through our book club. Love God. Love People. Do everything WithLove. We encourage you to get the book and read along with us as we discuss relevant topics in our upcoming podcasts! Current book: "Creativity, Inc." by Ed Catmull

title: POTATO: Possibilities Of Time And Things Overthere
description:
The planet Overthere has discovered Earth.
Earth has no idea where the peace-loving Overthere is, which makes picking a fight with it tricky.

Several years on, Earth is fully ensconced in its inferiority complex, speculation of imminent attack is rife.

And here's our aimless Polly, obliviously bumbling along, only to be rudely interrupted one night by a knock on the door and a visit from a friendly-looking 'alien' who gives her a code to unlock her life, the universe and anything she wants.

Starting with nothing, absolute zero, a pigeon, creativity and playing in the invisible worlds of philosophy, psychology, dreams and faith, how does one create the life they want? What would it be like to live forever? And did your cousin Vince really get abducted all those years ago and returned as a fish finger?

title: The Dark Word
description: An AudioHopper Podcast about Horror Writing, hosted by Philip Fracassi. Produced by AudioHopper and Book and Film Globe.

title: Światłocienie
description:
Pisarka, felietonistka, blogerka 📚🖋📻

#polskipodcast #realizmmagiczny #światłocienie #pisarka #kultura #literaturapiękna #magiawrzeczywistości

Rzeczywiście, magicznie, oczywiście nieoczywiście➰
Ze strefy światła i cienia🤍🖤
Życiowo, baśniowo, romantycznie, nostalgicznie, logicznie, dosłownie i w przenośni💫

„Światłocienie” to przestrzeń wyjątkowa.
Dla każdego i o każdym. Głębia istoty ukryta w prostocie. Najprawdziwsze emocje i przeżycia. Dualizm życia, wydobywanie blasku z ciemności.
Słowa, myśli i refleksje ubrane w metafory. Rzeczywistość i ukryta w niej magia. Miłość do świata, do ludzi, do siebie.
O doświadczaniu chwili, o ulotności. Tak jak w świecie, wszystko się w tej przestrzeni miesza. Sięga do głębi, wykroczy poza horyzont. Choć osadzone w rzeczywistości, to jednak z innego wymiaru.
Światłocienie.

title: Read The North
description:
In Season 2, explore every genre on your bookshelf in this behind-the-scenes deep dive featuring interviews with authors, booksellers, and publishing insiders!

Host Rebecca Diem examines what exactly genre is and how it is used to help readers find their perfect match, in bookstores and online.

Season 2 guests include booktuber Ariel Bissett, literary agent Carly Watters, editor Anita Chong, authors Amy Stuart, Uzma Jalaluddin, Naben Ruthnum, Helen Knott, John Brady McDonald, and Amal El-Mohtar, and booksellers from Toronto’s favourite independent bookshops!

Presented by The Word On The Street & Met Radio. Tune every other Wednesday this summer at 9:12AM and 5:02PM beginning July 5 - August 30th to listen to the Read The North live on Met Radio 1280AM or at metradio.ca.

Celebrate the 35th anniversary of The Word On The Street with us in 2024. Details and more at: toronto.thewordonthestreet.ca

title: Evie Prince Series Podcast
description:
Hello and welcome. Join me Victoria Wright, inspirational writer and series author as I narrate the Evie Prince Series. A fictional trilogy that tells the story of Evie Prince, a 40-something single woman who experiences a spiritual awakening. Her journey is one of beauty, discovery, and remembering her true self. Ego and fear have limited her world but leaps of faith and self love guide her to a life she never thought she could live. 

Each episode highlights reminders that were given to Evie to guide her journey and I trust they will guide you as well. Let Evie's story remind you of what you know to be true but have chosen to forget. 

Every two weeks I will post a new episode. To learn more about the series, visit www.healingwords.online. Print and e-books are available through all major book retailers.

Open, allow, and remember your truth.

title: Book Meet - Vite di personaggi che vorresti incontrare
description: Ancor prima di Facebook, Instagram e TikTok, gli adolescenti dei primi anni 2000 passavano i pomeriggi a chattare con gli amici, a parlare per ore e ore, a condividere interessi e passioni, a coltivare nuovi amori, stando comodamente seduti alla loro scrivania e affidandosi esclusivamente al loro buon vecchio pc. Nulla di strano, penserete, se non ché di smartphone e piani tariffari vantaggiosi allora nemmeno l’ombra. Dopo il pranzo e la visione di una puntata di Dragon Ball o dei Simpson, un adolescente accendeva il computer e si loggava con il proprio nickname su MSN Messenger, forse non la prima ma sicuramente la più famosa piattaforma di messaggistica istantanea usata da quegli adolescenti che hanno fatto parte della prima generazione veramente digitale nella storia dell’umanità. MSN era per i giovani dell’epoca l’acronimo prezioso della loro vita; era un luogo di incontro virtuale che dilatava ogni possibilità di interazione. Una vera e fighissima rivoluzione. Noi ne sappiamo qualcosa, perché noi siamo state quegli adolescenti. Per vari aspetti così vicine alla nuova generazione di oggi e al tempo stesso così lontani. La nostra adolescenza è qualcosa che abbiamo lasciato andare da poco, e forse ad oggi abbiamo ancora qualcosa di irrisolto, da analizzare e da comprendere su quegli anni così particolari della nostra vita. Crescendo siamo diventate bibliotecarie, e pensando alla Terra di Mezzo che è forse l’adolescenza nella vita di ciascun individuo ci siamo domandate: perché non chiedere aiuto ai libri, ai fumetti e ai manga, che altro non sono che lande perfette e sterminate da esplorare e nelle quali provare a cercare nuove risposte? Questo è “Book Meet. Vite di personaggi che vorresti incontrare”, un podcast condotto da Greta e Daniela, che guarda all’adolescenza di oggi, quella degli zoomer, così come alla nostra, quella dei millennials, attraverso libri e personaggi, iconici ed incredibili, che una volta incontrati nella finzione narrativa diventano parte integrante della realtà di ciascun lettore come vere persone in carne ed ossa.

title: Parker Duque
description:
PROGRESS: a sophomoric case for optimism is read by author Parker Duque.. 

You know what you can’t stop?  Progress.  

As an heir to the Duque Industrial Fixtures fortune, Parker Duque had everything, except his family’s good looks, but as everybody knows, less than average looks don’t matter when you’re ultra-rich.  Parker Duque had a trust fund, fake ambition, and a beautiful girlfriend who loved him instead of his money.  Then one night, Parker lost everything.  His well-meaning father had bankrupted the family company and their fortune was gone.  His beautiful girlfriend who loved him instead of his money left him too.  Would this rich kid sink or swim?

When we catch up with Parker Duque he’s completing the sale of his real estate interests to his partners/employers, “the best f***ing day of his life.”  This rich kid, against all odds, has become a self-made man. 

The euphoria of renewed self-worth wouldn’t last though, as Parker finds out his wife is cheating on him, and the world is about to be blown in two -- by aliens.  Can you imagine what it must be like to have everything, lose it, build it back yourself through years and years of hard work and struggle, and then lose it yet again?  But this time you were losing it because aliens were going to blow the earth in two?  Aliens?  It was hard for Parker too.  

With only a week (or two) left, would Parker Duque save the planet?  

“F*** that.”  Parker Duque was a realist.  There were several things Parker wanted to do with his last two weeks on Earth but first he had to escape “The Nest” where he’s being held by Dusty and Peaches, an odd pair of government agents.  Peaches, despite her morbid obesity, was an impossibly athletic, accomplished hitwoman, and Dusty, despite his small stature, had a vise-like grip and moved through the shadows like a gazelle, a tiny gazelle.  She was the largest woman in comfort shoes he had ever seen, and Parker knew she and the tiny man with the quick temper would prove to be a formidable duo...

Can Parker Escape?  What will he do if he does?  Is it really the end of the world?  Buckle up because there’s so much more, and it’s a wild and hilarious ride the entire way through…

title: The Sperber Prize Podcast
description:
The Sperber Prize Podcast is a show highlighting some of the most influential reporters and journalists around the world through their biographies and autobiographies. Join us as we speak with Sperber Prize nominees to talk about their lives as reporters, their book-writing process, and the state of journalism.


The Sperber Prize is given in honor of Ann M. Sperber, the author of the excellent biography of Edward R. Murrow, Murrow: His Life and Times (Fordham University Press). The book received numerous awards for its meticulous research and finely crafted writing and was a finalist in 1987 for the Pulitzer Prize. Through the generous support of Ann’s mother, Lisa, the prize was established to promote and encourage other outstanding biographies and memoirs related to the field of print and electronic journalism.

title: The Dig Bible Podcast
description: Welcome to The Dig Bible Podcast, do you have a curious mind? Often thought to yourself there has to be more to these stories in my Bible. Is knowing the “whys” important to you? Then you’ve found the right place! We are looking for those people that know there is more than what we’ve been taught. We are looking for those people that their beliefs that don’t “fit into the box”, and know that “For everyone who asks receives, and the one who seeks finds, and to the one who knocks it will be opened.” We believe that to truly understand the Bible we must put ourselves in the mindset of the writers, and to do that we must restore the “supernatural worldview” of the original audience to which they were writing to! So, with that being said don’t care to roll up your sleeves and get your hands dirty? LET’S DIG! Questions, comments, suggestions on future episode ideas we’d love to hear from you: thedig423@gmail.com. Join in on the conversations and exclusive content with our facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thedig423/

Acompaña a este par de ñoños que añoramos un mejor mañana mientras desgreñamos ideas venidas por igual de libros, películas, mitos, experiencias y demás.  Vamos a empequeñecernos ante el universo y todo lo que nos enseñe.

title: The Reading Black Girls Podcast
description:
The Reading Black Girls Podcast is an unfiltered show about everything we love and hate about the books we read. Join four beautiful, melanated HBCU-educated women: Alex, Aziza, Denisha, and Kayla as we unapologetically chat about books from a wide range of genres.

From non-fiction and romance to YA and historical fiction, we break down new and classical reads to discuss our favorite moments and our criticisms. Join us as we laugh, reflect, chastise, and recommend some of our personal book interests. Our mission is to inspire and change the way people view reading as a task and bring back the fun and exploration of simply finding a good book!

title: The BFF Bookcast
description:
Hey besties! We are your hosts Teresa and Katie and we would like to welcome you to the BFF Bookcast! We will be releasing episodes every Wednesday - you can visit our Instagram for our schedule. 

The podcast will consist of BFF Bookclub picks where we will deep dive into some of our favorite books and have general discussions surrounding the plot, characters, themes, etc. We will also be releasing episodes to chat about all things book related with the occasional guest (friends, authors, content creators)!

We are obsessed with all things Fantasy and Romance - if you put the two together even better. 

Always remember to check trigger warnings before reading any of the books we discuss. Also please remember that these are our opinions and we are here to have some fun! 

You can submit Bookclub requests for upcoming books you would like to hear us discuss to our email address (thiebff.bookclub1@gmail.com), as well as questions or topics you would also like for us to discuss.

title: Solo Voz e Ideas con Susana Ye
description:
La periodista y comunicadora púbica Susana Ye (aka la que escribe : ), hija de migrantes económicos chinos en España y primera generación nacida en Alicante (medio gata madrileña ya, todo sea dicho), cuenta con diez años de experiencia como reportera de justicia social.

En esta salita sonora (cambio a primera persona : P) comparto los libros, películas, música y cultura pop y subversiva que más me inspiran para mantenerme crítica, en constante desarrollo personal y en deconstrucción sobre género, raza, salud mental, brechas de clase y económicas y, en el camino, con muchísima calma y una pizca de sarcasmo, invito a que nos compartamos y a que creamos en un espacio seguro de escucha recíproca y de empatía y aceptación mutuas.

Mucha intensidad. Algo de carcajadas. Y, sobre todo: ganas y un ratito de conversación.

title: The Horse Human Connection - How We Learn From Horses
description:
'The outside of the horse reflects the inside of the human.'


Kia Ora, my name is Marianne Cotter, I am a facilitator, coach, wife, mother, daughter, sister, friend and life long learner.  
My life long passion is horses and I have been around these beautiful creatures since I was 9 years old. I just started dreaming about horses as a child and wanting to be near them and understand them, and I was lucky enough to be able to have horses in my life from an early age. I am the owner of 2 beautiful steeds Thomas & Frosty, and belong to a community of passionate horse people that spread the length of Aotearoa/New Zealand. 
I started this podcast, The Horse/Human Connection - How We Learn From Horses, as I have realised over the years that my horses have taught me way more than I have ever taught them. They have supported me through tough times, taught me to trust, be brave and resilient, to be open to learning, be a community member, to be responsible, to love and they have also given me many gut wrenching laughs over the years.
During this first series of the podcast I will be interviewing a range of different and very passionate people who have all had interesting and varied experiences with horses including a top level riding instructor and horse breeder, an Equine Assisted learning facilitator and coach, a vet, a passionate agistment owner, an equestrian manager from a high school and a rider who found her passion late in life. The focus of our conversations will not be on horsemanship as such, but rather what we continuously learn from these beautiful, wise, sentient creatures and how they have supported our wellbeing (body, mind and spirit) dreams, challenges, relationships and our life’s journey.  
I hope you enjoy listening, learning and reflecting, and it supports you with your own journey to uncover your passions and the journey of lifelong learning.   

Contact the show - mariannecotter69@gmail.com

title: Goals - A New Perspective
description:
Goals!  Have you ever thought what if goals could be more interesting, opening to a new perspective and more deepening? Well, I embarked upon this journey of my writing  for a topic to write in 2022, and I wondered to myself how about goals! Different types of goals to life. 

In this series of podcast, join me in discovering 12 different types of goals to life. This series is all about going deeper into what goals are all about and how one can live by them.

Starting by gratitude goal and ending on spiritual goal, this series is going to be very interesting, raw, bold, beautiful and spoken straight from my heart.

So I hope you can connect to it.

Love,
Marisha C.

title: Back Porch Stories
description:
Chuck Stead is a Story Teller, author and college professor from the Ramapo Mountain Region of lower New York State.  These are his stories of a happy, curious, and eventful childhood amongst the mountains, streams, and streets of the village known as Hillburn, New York. Here we meet Chuck's family and friends through stories passed down from his elders as well as those experienced by the author himself.  Some are the sweet and funny experiences of a young boy in the hopeful 1950's and turbulent sixties. Others are deeply moving and meaningful memories that will live in your thoughts for years to come. All of them will leave you wanting for more.   

Each week on Friday Morning we'll add a new Chapter/Episode followed by a short musical break and then Chuck will chat about the episode with a guest or two. Some might even be the real life people upon which his stories and characters are based.  We hope you'll enjoy these after episode chats and share these podcasts with family and friends.

This is a learning process for Juliane, and she will be sharing her own experiences and encounters with the academic culture. The goal? A new episode will be released every fortnight on Mondays except for during the summer holiday.

title: Human Books
description:
Human Books condivide centinaia di letture.

Sceglieremo un libro al mese al quale daremo una valutazione su 3 criteri: 
1-Chiarezza dei contenuti
2-Originalità dei contenuti
3-Applicabilità

La nostre valutazioni non vogliono essere delle recensioni, bensì il punto di vista di chi porta in campo i temi affrontati nei testi che proponiamo e che valgono come spunti di riflessione.

Vi diremo se queste letture ci sono servite, se ci hanno aiutato a fare meglio quello che facciamo, se siamo cresciuti grazie ad esse. Non vi diremo che questo vale per tutti, non tutti i "cibi mentali" nutrono tutti allo stesso modo.

title: Mixed Media - A Podcast by Kavi Gupta
description:
Mixed Media is a window opened unexpectedly onto a landscape of ideas, featuring a rotating cast of artists, curators, writers, art collectors, and members of the Kavi Gupta staff, casually discussing the sweetness and mystery and chaos of great art in front of a microphone.

Kavi Gupta amplifies voices of diverse and underrepresented artists to expand the canon of art history. Through innovative and ambitious exhibitions, multimedia programming, and rigorous publications, we foster an evolving conversation among international communities about art and ideas. In addition to hosting more than a dozen major exhibitions each year, and participating in vital international art fairs, we host artist talks, facilitate special programming in support of philanthropic causes, and foster intellectual discourse by regularly bringing artists, curators, and collectors together with academics and experts in the contemporary art field.

title: La regola Tolkien
description:
La nostra civiltà sta attraversando una profonda crisi che può sfociare in un epocale trapasso culturale.

Cosa fare di fronte al concreto rischio della morte della nostra identità?

Di fronte al progetto di annientamento delle nazioni volto a instaurare un ‘nuovo ordine mondiale’, non si può che immedesimarsi nei protagonisti del capolavoro di Tolkien, ‘Il Signore degli Anelli’, i quali hanno dovuto aspramente lottare per difendere la propria esistenza.

Pertanto, ricercando le cause e illustrando le conseguenze della crisi civile e sociale che stiamo vivendo, nel libro si aprono nuove prospettive per dare un reale contributo alla causa della libertà e della sovranità nazionale, in modo da uscirne vittoriosi, proprio come è avvenuto nella trilogia tolkieniana.

title: A BRIDGE OF DOOM
description:
THE THEATRICAL AUDIOBOOKS OF KURT HOTELLING --------thehearkentheatre.com

THREE PATHS CONVERGE… PRELUDE: THE HOSTAGE PRINCE – The bonds are tight, his sword broken, the possibility of rescue hopeless; heir to the throne of the western kingdom, Prince Kajor will soon be sacrificed on the reptilian Grems’ primitive altar of blood and revenge. And yet, he fears neither his enemies, the endless torture, nor death but the eventual ruin of his people under their hateful claws. Doubtful of her charged task, a young woman, Royal Messenger under guidance from the only Master Enchanter, undertakes an impossible mission: seeking help from a mythical and almost forgotten demigod. AGENTS OF THE DARK ONE – A final heartbeat, demons at the door, an appeal for help, and a chance bridge across the void of the Unknown… violations of metaphysical law during the rescue of Prince Kajor have brought the inescapable wrath and cold justice of Spectres; dark retribution and a singular, violent death stalk Royal Messenger Marie. Back home, bereft of any trace of his adventure, Paul is heartbroken amidst questions about his own sanity. Rothson can only hope his final expenditure of Power will reach demigod and enchanter before disaster befalls and all that they have achieved is overturned. ENCHANTER’S LOT – A faint breath of shadow whispers past Maximillian amidst his private ritual of black magic, bidding him find someone; Paul helps Marie adjust to existence in his complicated world, unaware of the dark forces seeking them out; Enchanter Gaiwan's manhunt for a renegade sorcerer turns sour, bringing upon him the wrath of dragons, and a nearly impossible errand. Relentlessly, all are drawn to meet across A BRIDGE OF DOOM.

A lot of time and energy is required to present my THEATRICAL AUDIOBOOKS, to provide productions of my published novels with the high quality and detail I expect of myself in this personal endeavor. And, if you haven't keyed to it, yet, listening with good headphones provides the most immersive experience! I would be extremely grateful for you to 'buy me a coffee,' as this will help production and equipment costs. Go to Ko-fi.com/thehearkentheatre. And thank you, truly! thehearkentheatre@yahoo.com

title: Love & Its Discontents
description:
Love & Its Discontents is a podcast on the topic of LOVE and LOVE STORIES. 

Starting with Jeffrey Eugenides's claim, in My Mistress Sparrow is Dead, “Love stories, nearly without exception, give love a bad name,” the podcast will take you on a journey through literature from antiquity to contemporary stories, wrestling with notions such as romantic love and altruism, deep diving into ecstatic love and solidarity. It asks, Can love be examined like an object? What on earth is love? Where in the world is love? Are we born to love, born with a natural sense of certain things like goodness, and beauty? Is love, like Rumi said, perfect thirst? But most importantly it will follow the question: can there be love without love stories?

The host, Adnan Mahmutović is a Bosnian-Swedish writer and lecturer in English literature and creative writing at Stockholm University.

If you have a particular story you want to talk about send us your pitch to: lovediscontents@gmail.com.

title: Caravan of Pain: The True Story of the Tattoo the Earth Tour
description: Brace yourself for a roller coaster thrill ride as you join the Tattoo the Earth 2000 summer tour of America, the most insane tour ever inflicted on a continent. Featuring twenty of metal’s biggest bands, including Metallica, Slipknot, and Slayer, plus Filip Leu, Sean Vasquez, and the world’s best tattoo artists, these renegade outsiders pissed off all the wrong music business heavyweights but left delirious inked fans in their wake. "Caravan of Pain" is a rip-roaring music business underdog tale: compelling, hysterical, and cautionary. Its unique peek inside the world of music festivals, metal, and tattooing gives the reader a front row seat to a watershed time in our culture at the turn of the millennium. "Caravan of Pain" is a story of inspiration, persistence, and the dark side of following a dream. Narrated by Khristian Lee

title: The Truth
description:
Do You Know The Holy Spirit

Be honest here, how many of you can define what is the Holy Spirit? Not many I presume, for I too was one who knew nothing of the Holy Spirit except for some bits and pieces of information I had retained from the masses I had attended. But it was after one blissful encounter that piqued my interest in discovering more about this Holy Specter. What exactly is it? how do we define it? and what is its role in Christianity?

Also called the Holy Ghost or Paraclete, it is the third constitute of Christianity. The other two are the father, which is God almighty, and then the son, which is our lord and savior, Jesus Christ. So how can we make Holy Spirit more tangible for our understanding? Think of it as the power of God in action. It’s his active force that gets the will of God done. Yes, it is indeed an invisible force, or rather, a power that is unperceivable by humans. But the effects it produces are very visible and tangible as well. 

The Holy Spirit is not a person; it is referred to as many things across the Bible but a person. You will find words like Breath, Wind, An animating force in living creatures, Hand, and even Fingers. It is also referred to as faith and knowledge. There are numerous mentioning of the Holy Spirit in the Acts of the Apostles, in which there are numerous acts associated with it such as Prophecies/Prophesizing, Healing, Glossolalia, and Exorcism. In biblical art, it is represented as a dove.

How do we know Holy Spirit does not refer to a person? Well, when Christian martyr Stephen received a miraculous heavenly vision, he only saw people; this signifies Holy Spirit is not a person. As stated in Bible,

“He, being full of the holy spirit, gazed into heaven and caught sight of God’s glory and of Jesus standing at God’s right hand.” (Acts 7:55)

Here, the Holy Spirit is defined as the power of God in action that enabled Stephen to see the holy vision of God and Jesus by his side. One very common misconception is that Holy Spirit is secondary to Father and Son, which absolutely not true; the true believer must admit the Holy Spirit as equal in substance to the Father and Son, for they all exist in harmony with each other. As such, the eastern and western churches now view the Holy Spirit as a bond between the Father and Son, a mutual charity. Which implies the two are absolutely united in the Spirit. 

For us, Holy Spirit is a helper. It is the embodiment of God’s help that reaches us and fills us with divine bliss at the time when we need it the most. It sanctifies us and rids us of our sins, making us pure and more like Christ. It is because of the Holy Spirit that we get close to God and are directed towards the will of our holy father.

title: Słuchanocki
description:
Bajki, baśnie, legendy na dobranoc.

W moim zamyśle historyjki te podzielone są na albumy, ale ze względu na brak możliwości zmiany numeracji - numery podcastów są po kolei i tylko opisy wskazują jaki to "album" :)

Są dwie rzeczy, o których chciałabym wspomnieć:
1. Staram się podchodzić do tego "recytatorsko", ale bez "aktorskich fajerwerków", bo z założenia są to bajeczki do snu, więc nieco ograniczam słowną ekspresję - z naciskiem na "nieco";
2. W tle można usłyszeć czasami szelest obracanej karki - efekt zamierzony, nie powinien przeszkadzać, a chodzi o ten klimat czytania książki.

Uwielbiam czytać i staram się żeby słuchający miał taką samą przyjemność ze słuchania jak ja z czytania, względnie - usypiał tak szybko jak się da! xD

title: Rolo's Writing Room
description:
The students of Mr. Rolo’s Advanced 8th Grade ELA class present to you Rolo’s Writing Room, a podcast made for teens, by teens.  The relatable and humorous hosts, Liberty, Marissa, and Abby are here to guide you through the process of NaNoWriMo (National Novel Writing Month) which takes place every November.  We will discuss planning your novel, how to get into a writing mood, how to revise a finished work, tricks of the trade, and even how we juggle school and NaNo.  Our resident artist, Sage, will interview other students from the Advanced ELA class, as well as High schoolers who still participate in NaNo, and even acclaimed authors.  So pull out your writing ideas and favorite keyboard and get ready to stretch your creativity!  Come, write with us in Rolo’s Writing Room!

Artwork by Sage
Jingle by Havyn
Music by Keith Witty

title: Anno Amagium
description:
A long-form, contemporary fantasy series following wizard detectives in a world where everyone commands the power of magic. Supported by patrons of Patreon.com/AnnoAmagium.

---
The scholar-warriors of the Amagium swear themselves to a sacred charge: governing humanity’s inherent capacity to wield magic. Through a complex licensure system, they decree which spells and arcane artifice are permissible for public, “asfalis” use.

Arroyo, The City of Bridges and Roses, is a suburb of Los Angeles that seems like it crawled out of a storybook. Five palatial terraces of land are connected by a myriad of bridges over gulches where the brambles of a colossal, petrified rose briar reside. But this seemingly-tranquil city seethes with dark secrets and otherworldly threats amass in its shadows.

Sevardin Harker, a newly minted member of the Amagium’s Peacekeeping Force, is thrust into the deep end on his second day on the job, when he has a life-threatening encounter with a form of magic most people believe to be fiction.

Meanwhile, Hace Matthews and Alinore Valmont, two precocious aspiring peacekeepers, begin their 11-year matriculation at Arroyo’s Athenaeum, the Amagium’s rigorous training ground...
---

For more episodes, references, and other information, please visit AnnoAmagium.com. I hope you enjoy the story! If it resonates, please share it with fellow fantasy fans, and consider backing us to fund more episodes. Thank you for listening!  -Hank

Es una comunidad donde se publican historias y relatos de miedo, terror, suspense, misterio y anécdotas relacionados con los mismo .  Donde los enigmas y las reglas de mas extraña procedencia son el pan de cada día.

Esta comunidad crece gracias a vosotros, por eso, si queréis contar una anécdota hacedlo en el apartado de correos :

 trasilvaniastorysteling@gmail.com

Recuerda siempre, la mejor historia no es la que se cuenta o escucha por el día o por la noche, si no la que se cuenta con el corazón . La que transmite sentimientos  , honestidad y sinceridad y sobre todo ,para entretener y enseñar algo . 

Si lo que buscas son historias de terror que te hagan pensar, interactuar con la comunidad y conmigo adivinando adivinanzas, ver metáforas y grotescas apariciones de monstruos que a Lovecraft le helarían la sangre, ven, únetenos .

¿A que esperas ? 

¡ Visita mi canal de YouTube si quieres ver las ultimas historias en ser publicadas !

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHHLEhVtZpaJ0PCBZt43KkQ

description:
People and Value which I call “the heart” of the business is pivoted by engagement. Setting your digital footprint harbor elements that expand your reach, credibility and build an online community around your business. The power of engagement in the position of providing value-your unique solutions, products, and guidance to the people is encompassed with vital keys;

(1) Social Media

Social networking sites help you establish yourself as a thoughtful, sophisticated, and exceptional leader in your niche or industry, and most importantly, build a strong relationship with your clients.

(2) Website

This is the informational online home that helps you showcase products and services and tell more of your story. Moreso, this is your jack of all trades associate who enlightens your distinctive creativity, the art of selling, and networking.

(3) Email

The most effective way of getting leads and communicating with your clientele. Branding your email gives a better taste and inspires customer confidence leading to huge traffic for your business.

Even without a lot of technical experience, you can take your small business online by taking a strategic approach to building a web presence. Go ahead and grab my guide for step-by-step instructions to take your small business online.

title: 1 – Jeg taler dansk!
description: Velkommen til min podcast hvor jeg taler dansk. I lang historie kort… jeg er Australiens og besøgte Danmark i 2016 hvor jeg var ‘øjeblikkeligt’ i elskede med danskerne, dansksproget og Danmark! Jeg boede med min udvekslings familie og fundet mange venner! Det var det bedste år! Min tid var slut når 2016 var færdige fordi jeg manglere at flyve tilbage til australier. Dansk er svært at tale så min mål var til at finde dansk podcasts og YouTube kanel. Det var to problem… der var ikke så mange dansk folk i australier og min location giver mig ikke så meget dansk shows på Netflix og YouTube. Men jeg prøvede og prøvede at forsætte at snakker med min danske familie og danske venner og fundet mere og mere dansk podcast og selvfølegig snakke til min selv. Og til nylig jeg havde en ide! Jeg kunne starte min egen dansk YouTube kanel og dokument min rejse og være meget bedre til dansk og starte et dansk fællesskab! Så tusind tak hvis du har læse og ser min 1st episode og jeg vil gerne være ‘starte nogle ting særlig’

title: Scrittori Pensanti: Autori e Libri da scoprire...
description:
Scrittori Pensanti, è lo spazio de La Mente Pensante Magazine interamente dedicato alla scoperta di meravigliose opere letterarie, raccontate direttamente dalla voce degli autori. Scrittori Pensanti, appunto, che, attraverso la meravigliosa arte della scrittura, ci aprono le porte a mondi fatti di sfide, vittorie, fallimenti, e tanto coraggio. Il coraggio di rendere pubblica la propria vita, le proprie esperienze e, spesso, le proprie sofferenze attraverso il magico mondo dei libri.

La Mente Pensante Magazine è un progetto editoriale no-profit, che, attraverso il prezioso contributo di autori volontari, si occupa della creazione e della divulgazione online di contenuti di qualità, esclusivamente relativi ad argomenti di Psicologia, di Crescita Personale e di Neuroscienze.

Scrittori Pensanti è una rubrica a cura di Valentina Valoroso Autrice e Editor presso de La Mente Pensante Magazine.

SE DESIDERI PARTECIPARE ALLA RUBRICA "SCRITTORI PENSANTI"...

title: The Kinsmen Die Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Kinsmen Die podcast, home of fantasy fiction based on Norse mythology that’s written and read by me, Matt Bishop.

I’ve written two novels – Kinsmen Die and Dark Grows the Sun. They are the first two books in my series called And the Heavens Burn. In this podcast I read my first book, Kinsmen Die, chapter by chapter.

I believe I’ve done something unique when it comes to the retelling those old stories. The point of view characters in my books are the characters from the myths themselves: Odin and Frigg. Vidar. Hodr. Loki. And, because the dude is awesome and has a really tough name to pronounce: Vafthrudnir.

Everything you’ll hear is based on my interpretation of the two main source materials – the Poetic Edda and the Prose Edda, along with a stack of books that discuss the myths … and another stack of academic articles that do the same.

Kinsmen Die has 92 chapters. Dark Grows the Sun is about half that. So, this is gonna take a while. I truly hope you enjoy the journey.

title: The Civil War with Kevin Yaney
description: Kevin Yaney, author of The Fourth of July trilogy, talks about different aspects of the American Civil War, what led to the war and how he came to write the historical fiction books that make up The Fourth of July trilogy.

title: The Write Turn
description:
Have you ever asked yourself questions like these: When do I show, when do I tell? What does effective dialogue sound like? How do I tell my readers about my awesome worldbuilding?! Author Jordan M. Griffin takes you through the ins and outs of writing powerful stories, shares her experience navigating the tricky world of publishing, and even reads some of your stories, all with a side of humor that make the lessons fun and digestible.

Jordan M. Griffin is an author and fiction editor. Her stories have been published in Night Picnic Press, Planet Scumm Magazine, and Embark Literary Journal, among others. She has been shortlisted for the 2022 Lascaux Flash Fiction Contest and longlisted for the 2021 Novel Slices Summer Contest. She is also an associate fiction editor with The Northwest Review. You can find more at https://jordanmgriffin.com/

title: Welcome to Artistoria
description: Listen along to the dramatic reading of this fantasy adventure novel: Colors of Convergence, Artistoria : Book 1 . . . . Green, Red, Blue, Yellow, Orange, Silver. In the world of Artistoria, Color has been gifted to its people. This unique form of energy, once harnessed and trained, grants a wide array of immensely special abilities. In the vast world, Owin Warstone has honed his Red in on a single purpose for his life. If he can dodge the troublesome guild he is associated with, battle through the scum of the major cities, and investigate a mysterious group that's stealing travelers from the streets, he may just be able to recruit enough allies to help further his vendetta. Leigh seems like a good ally. Her Orange is strong but she is so cagey and awkward. Why won't she talk more about her home of Amber? In the end, it doesn't matter, as long as she can fight. "How hard can it be? I'm only setting off to kill the most powerful man in the world."

title: IL PARLALIBRO di CdA Team (Caffè delle Arti)

Voci: Michela Barone (attrice, doppiatrice e regista teatrale), Maury Incen (attore, doppiatore, scrittore, insegnante di recitazione), Mara Fronzi (attrice, per il cinema, la TV, il teatro, e doppiatrice), Angelo Blasetti (attore e doppiatore).

Registrazione, editing e montaggio sono a cura di Mauro Iannuccelli, tecnico del suono, musicista e compositore presso MultimediaPower Studio.

I testi sono stati concessi in uso a CdA per tutte le attività di promozione e divulgazione, in relazione ai premi citati o su esplicita Il parlalibro: richiesta degli autori.

Tutti i diritti restano di proprietà degli autori.

È vietata qualsiasi modifica, anche parziale, senza il loro esplicito consenso.

title: The Art Of Being Unbothered
description:
Your Comprehensive Guide To Becoming An Unbothered Pro In All
Aspects Of Life And Interaction
The Art of Being Unbothered is a collection of analytical and philosophical conclusions derived from everyday interactions with the people and situations we encounter. These stories justify why being unbothered is a life-altering and elongating skill that everyone should learn. Moreover, the reader is ushered through a series of steps that explain how to overcome and prevent botheredness. Whether you're dealing with your parents, partner, or colleagues this book articulates specific instructions on how to develop solutions that lead to positive and unbothered outcomes. We hope you enjoy this self-guided journey to being unbothered by life and all interactions.

title: James Kingdon - Classic Audiobooks
description: I have an absolute passion for narration and voice-over. It’s an unparalleled arena for fabulous imaginative creativity. I find it so exciting to be able to create pictures and emotions simply by using my voice and to share that with listeners. From a young age I was a voracious reader and would spend hours inventing character voices for whichever book I was enthralled by at the time. As a child I read Dickens, Tolkien, Eddings, Stevenson… I trained at the Bristol Old Vic Theatre School receiving outstanding training from Voice Specialists Francis Thomas and Lynette Irving, refining my vocal technique and flexibility, plus excellent radio technique training from BBC producer Brian Miller. I work as a professional voice over artist and actor and have a particular affinity with the Classics, Science Fiction and Fantasy. I also co run Summer Light Theatre with my partner Joanna, dedicated to bringing world class theatre to everyone via our YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/@SummerLightTheatre/).

title: Non Dimenticarlo
description:
NON DIMENTICARLO  di e con Arianna Brandolini e Paul R Cuddle - 
tratto dall’omonimo romanzo di Luca Contato - Musiche di Paul R Cuddle, testi di Arianna Brandolini e Luca Contato.  Questa sera vi vogliamo raccontare una storia, una storia che è contenuta tra le pagine di questo libro . Badate bene, non vogliamo raccontarvi il libro. Quello, chi vorrà, potrà leggerlo. Piuttosto vogliamo raccontarvi un punto di vista diverso. Il punto di vista di una protagonista silenziosa, troppo silenziosa. Cristina. 
Perché silenziosa dite? Ogni cosa a suo tempo. 
Per raccontarvi le sensazioni, le emozioni dei nostri protagonisti, abbiamo pensato che le sole parole della Vita non sarebbero bastate e ci siamo affidati al Tempo della musica: il tempo necessario alle emozioni per poter scorrere dal cuore alla mente.

Buon ascolto

title: Osbcast
description:
Yo People!! 

Welcome to my first-ever podcast, its something I've had in the pipeline for a while, but to be brutally honest was too nervous to do. 

If you're not familiar with my page, I launched my page @ozzyosb around 6 months ago, to be the person I never had. 

Growing up as a young working-class man from a poc background, I never saw anyone like me in the spaces I aspired to be in. 

People from my background don't have any positive role models, self development is discouraged and stigmatised by peers from a young age, and any ambition is crushed from the get go. 

So, I wanted to launch a personal page where I share my insights, knowledge, advice, and network with the next generation of people from my background. 

To be the person I never had growing up. 

The aim of this podcast is to provide a space to share more intimate platform of engagement. Where I will be sharing more vulnerable, raw, and authentic reflections from my personal experiences.

 In hope to encourage you to do the same, with your peers, platform, and yourself. 

I hope you enjoy this new form of content, make sure to follow and engage for more, and if you enjoy share with your peers😁

Be the change you want to see, 

Peace ppl🙌🏼

title: SHAMEFUL PROWESS Romance Super Novel June Release
description:
Charlee Rae grew up tucked away in a pauperized small town in Northern Mississippi. She spent her summers walking barefoot through old cotton mills and peeping over her pawpaw’s shoulder as he made moonshine in the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains.

Charlee knew at a young age that she had no desire to follow in the isolated footsteps of everyone in the deep South, especially those living in her sleepy town. She was born with ambition, determination, vitality, discipline and, above all, the natural looks and personality that set her apart from most of the world.

Trying to break away from the label of garbage can poor, Charlee’s charisma was inherent in her personality; however, her biggest fear was remaining on a route of strife and impoverishment. Due to this overwhelming fear, she grew up obsessed with the idea of opulence and finding ways to position herself among the social elite.

Charlee Rae’s targets were easily fooled by her charming character, which hid a cunning villainy. Charlee became the master of her fate, controlling people and circumstances that manufactured her dark side.

Charlee schooled herself on the established traits of being a master manipulator. She was uninhibited and iniquitous in using her appeal to lure in any man of her choice. However, these men always had one thing in common--money. Her endless games of trickery and implausible convictions fueled a thrilling rush but pushed her into a world of immorality.

Witness as Charlee Rae masters her craft of seduction to control the world’s richest and most powerful men. Fade into the emotional struggles of her upbringing that paved the path of her methodical thinking. Take a front-row seat to learn the bona fide secrets and wretchedness clung onto the crème de la crème. At what price would you sell your soul or commodify your body to the illusion of the haut monde? Suppose you were Charlee Rae, would you make the same risky decisions? Will authentic love finally end her compulsions?
