title: Policing Greene: A Policeman at the Sunset of the Jim Crow South
description:
In 1964 at age 48, Carlton Lewis took an abrupt turn in life to become a policeman in a rural Georgia county - half white, half black – that must cope with new federal civil rights laws. He was a roughneck Son of the South whose grandfather owned slaves. How would he perform in his new role? Would he treat all Greene County citizens fairly and equally regardless of their color? This is the true story of an exceptional police officer at a turning point in U.S. history.

Recruited as a deputy to legendary Greene County Sheriff L. L. Wyatt, Carlton Lewis rose to become Wyatt’s Chief Deputy before taking on the job of Chief of Police of the small Greene County town of Union point. His 22-year career led Carlton Lewis through many incidents and encounters ranging from murder and extortion to banishing a peacock. Along the way, Carlton’s predilection for a good fight and equal justice for all of Greene’s citizens exposed him to dangers mostly unknown to his family.

When it was clear that federally-enforced integration of schools would occur in Georgia, the Greene County school superintendent stated that they would do the right thing without being ordered by having a few teachers volunteer to go the black and white schools to set examples for the community. Carlton’s wife Eleanor was the first white teacher to volunteer to go to the black school. This was a clear indication of the Lewis family’s attitude towards the societal changes coming their way. While Carlton would arrest and get in “tussles” with many of Greene County African Americans throughout his policing years, he would make sure that they received the same treatment in the justice system as did the white citizens he arrested. When Sheriff Wyatt died in 1977, community black leaders encouraged Carlton to run for the vacant office. He was grateful for such support but decided to complete his career by staying on as the Union Point police chief.

In early 1986, as Carlton was approaching retirement, his son Tom, then Chief of Staff to Georgia Governor Joe Frank Harris, sat down with his dad and recorded their conversation about Carlton's policing exploits. Two months later, and just two weeks after his retirement, Carlton Lewis collapsed and died while on one of his daily walks. He had been shot at, bludgeoned on the head, and bloodied in numerous knock-down-drag-outs but survived his policing career only to be taken down by a fatal heart attack. 

Those audio recordings were incorporated in the 2018 book Policing Greene written in a collaboration between Tom and his friend Hal McAlister, who worked together at Georgia State University where Tom was a senior Vice President and Advisor to the President and Hal was Regents Professor of Astronomy. Their book is available on Amazon.com. Now, you can hear Carlton, Tom, and others describe incidents and encounters from the book, brought back to life in their own voices in these five podcast episodes.  

This podcast is sponsored by Team BlueLine, a non-profit giving back to families of fallen officers physically or mentally injured in the line of duty. Visit teamblueline.org. 

The episodes were produced by Andrew (Drew) Nelson with the editing assistance of Marion (Mars) Rinaldi. Drew narrates the series, and Mars reads occasional passages from the book. You can learn more about the book at amazon.com and halmcalister.com.

title: Los Poemas de la locura
description:
Arrancamos con la lectura que da el nombre al Podcast "Los Poemas de la locura" de Friedrich Hölderlin...

En cada episodio se podrá escuchar un fragmento de su poesía considerada en el siglo XIX como locura. Nuestro autor casi la mitad de su vida estuvo "encerrado" en una torre, donde podía contemplar la naturaleza con una magnífica panorámica y un espíritu sensible y romántico. 

Johann Christian Friedrich Hölderlin nace el 20 de marzo de 1770 en Lauffen am Neckar Wurtemberg, y muere el 7 de junio de 1843 en Tubinga, Reino de Wurtemberg.

Te invito a ponerte cómodo y escuchar esta delicia poética.

title: Publishing Rodeo: The Good, The Bad, and the Bloody Ugly
description:
In 2022, two authors debuted in the same genre, with the same publisher, in the same year. Yet each of their books, and subsequently each of their careers, went in very different directions. That pattern repeats itself throughout the industry, over and over. Why does this happen, and what does it mean?

In THE PUBLISHING RODEO podcast, we aim to answer those questions and many more, using collated experiences from ourselves, friends, colleagues, and a slew of industry professionals in an attempt to deconstruct what makes or breaks a book, along with how to build–and maintain!–an author career.

Whether you're a die-hard fan of fantasy romance or just looking to dip your toes into the genre, this podcast is the perfect companion for any reader. So grab a cup of tea, cozy up with a good book, and join the conversation with "Smutty Scriptures"!

title: Libro de los Abrazos
description:
Libro de los Abrazos de Eduardo Galeano.

Eduardo Galeano (nace el 03 de Septiembre de 1940 y muere 13 de Abril de 2015) fue un prolífico escritor uruguayo nacido en Montevideo. Su compromiso con latinoamérica y el mundo lo hizo conocido por el libro "Las Venas Abiertas de América Latina". Escribió, prosa, poesía, entre las cuales se encuentra "El libro de los abrazos" el cual es un compendio de breves relatos que abarcan diversos temas como cultura, sociedad o literatura.

En este Podcast se leerán algunos de sus poemas.

Así que te invito a que te pongas cómodo y te dejes abrazar por su poesía.

Un intreccio di personaggi tra umorismo, comicità, dramma e grottesco. Sentimenti contrari e paradossali, immersi nella monumentale opera novellistica del drammaturgo Girgentino Luigi Pirandello, premio Nobel.

Una donna fuori dagli schemi, la cui unicità dei suoi scritti vive in modo imprescindibile dalla reale complessità umana della scrittrice. La scrittrice sarda ci conduce nel suo “post-verismo” narrativo dentro alcuni piccoli e magistrali racconti esprimendo una scrittura personale che affonda le sue radici nella conoscenza della cultura e della tradizione sarda.

Chaos Talking

This is a new chaotic podcast, hosted by a chaotic duo who will literally talk about anything and everything.

We will talk about a range of topics. Mainly

title: Selfpublisher aan het woord
description:
Een goed boek schrijven is zo eenvoudig nog niet. Een succesvol auteur worden evenmin. Je kunt dan ook geen beter advies krijgen dan van een selfpublisher die jou is voorgegaan.

Tijdens deze podcasts, dat opnames zijn van online webinars, gaan we in gesprek met auteurs die een een boek hebben uitgegeven in eigen beheer of dat van plan zijn.

Een absolute aanrader voor iedereen die (ooit) een boek wil uitgeven of daar al mee bezig is.

title: Galaverna
description:
Rudy, un trasmutante giramondo che si palesa ovunque ci sia bisogno di lui, si ritrova nei panni di una ragazza sedicenne accompagnata da Nazar, una potente entità spirituale che -come sempre- lo affiancherà in questa missione dopo avergli assegnato il suo nuovo nome.

Una minaccia incombe sull'isola di Coral Marittimo e la galaverna sta per abbattersi sul mare.

Il Guardiano dell'isola è senza forze, ed il male si prepara a carpire le anime dei suoi abitanti.

L'unica speranza di salvezza ricade su Dennis, un ragazzo di 19 anni che dovrà scoprire le sue origini ed abbracciare la sua missione, o cadere insieme alla sua gente.

Riusciranno Rudy e Nazar a risvegliare il potere di Dennis prima che sia troppo tardi, o il gelo coprirà ogni cosa?

©SheilaRosatiCopyright2023 RSSVERIFY

title: Books On the Go Introduction
description: This podcast is a quick introduction to a new bookstore, Books On the Go. The podcast gives location, operating hours, and products. The other podcast that follows welcomes Southeast Author Rayburn Casey Hall, and two books Reminiscing the Good Ole Days and Raised on Pinto Beans and Cornbread.

description: A husband and wife talk books.

title: The Smutty Book Club
description:
Just a couple of middle aged women who have read way too much smut since they were way too young, talking about the crazy books we read. Not for the faint of heart.....or those with a lack of humor.

Please always check your trigger warnings. Some of the books we read can be heavy and with topics that are sensitive to some readers. We care about you guys and you're mental health.

title: Fiction Addiction - Books & Beyond
description: Fiction Addiction : Books & Beyond is more than a Book Review Podcast. I'll also be using books and their writers as a trigger to discuss some of the many issues we face in our everyday lives and on the world stage at the moment. Great writers, through their books - and using fictional vehicles of story & character - can uniquely shine a light on these issues. I'll be welcoming some of them to discuss their work and their inspiration with me.

title: Surpassing Worth
description: Two brothers get their heads together and talk everything God, gospel, kingdom, and culture. "Indeed, I count everything as loss because of the surpassing worth of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord." -Philippians 3:8

title: Written In Thorns
description: Join International Author, Chaotic Rose Media’s CEO, and singer-songwriter Dhani Rose as she dives into everything written. Discussing lyrics, poetry, prose, screenplays, short stories, and novels, to everything in between, like marketing, editing, and touring, and even dive into inspiration and introspection, where a lot of creativity can come from. Open the cover to the whole world of writing, the beauty and the pain. Episodes will cover mature content, audience discretion advised. Written In Thorns is a Chaotic Rose Media production. Written, produced, and hosted by Dhani Rose.

title: Fausta YeP - Yoga e Pilates - Problem solving al femminile
description:
In questi podcast condivido con te le mie passioni legate allo Yoga, al Pilates, Ayurveda, Meditazione e tutto ciò che riguarda il problem solving al femminile.

Strumenti che mi hanno permesso di evolvere in chi sono oggi,

Una me autentica.

Ti parlerò di tutto il mio sapere e di quello che può aiutarti a riconoscerti facendoti scegliere prima TE e il tuo benessere.

Ricorda TU sei la persona più importante della tua vita.

Inizia da te e scegli il podcast che più ti incuriosisce, ovunque tu sia, in auto o facendo una passeggiata

Dai nutrimento alla tua anima!

Ti auguro un buon ascolto 🙏🏻💕

title: Deliciously Lit
description: Deliciously Lit is the perfect podcast for foodies, bookworms, and adventurers alike! Join us as we explore stories from all over the world that bring together books, food, drinks and more. Learn about how cultures intersect with flavors, discover new recipes and ingredients to try at home, and be inspired by unique conversations between experts in the culinary field. Our podcast opens up a whole new way to appreciate literature and travel right from your living room. Come join us on our journey of discovery - it's sure to be Deliciously Lit!

description:
Hi, lovely members of the Flock!

My name is Nymona, and I'll be your guide in all things literary.

Sit back, relax, and dive deep with me into different stories within the Public Domain! From the darkest horrors to the deepest fantasies, no book is safe from my grubby little hands.

title: Tecnografias
description:
Tecnografias é uma nova plataforma de debate transatlântico em redor de livros recentes na área da antropologia e das ciências sociais. Trata-se de um podcast coordenado por um coletivo de antropólogas/os e cientistas sociais sediado em Portugal e no Brasil. Cada episódio é uma conversa e um convite para refletir sobre os grandes desafios do mundo contemporâneo na sua complexidade e pluriversalidade. Disponível nas melhores plataformas de podcasts, incluindo Spotify, Google Podcasts, Apple Podcasts, entre outras. Tecnografias é produzido pela Rede de Pesquisa Internacional Sci-Tech Asia e é apoiado pelo Grupo de Pesquisa "Tecnociência, Sociedade e Ambiente" do CIAS – Centro de Investigação em Antropologia e Saúde da Universidade de Coimbra.

Equipa de Coordenação:

Cristina Sá Valentim, Gonçalo D. Santos, Rodrigo Toniol, e Rosana Castro

Equipa de Produção:

Bruna Coelho, Lívia Humaire

title: QUID EST VERITAS di Luca Santilli
description:
La versione audio magistralmente recitata da Mario Lucarelli ci regala una emozione unica.

Quid est veritas, un Vangelo moderno, esemplato sui Vangeli canonici. Luca Santilli ha lavorato per alcuni anni- anni di energica felicità creativa- a un progetto di grande poesia, Quid est veritas, che fosse intreccio di intuizioni fulminee e immagini profetiche. La narrazione, di perdurante aspirazione universalistica, s’inscrive all’interno di una struttura letteraria suddivisa in cinque parti, quattro delle quali risultano dedicate al discorso poetico fino a giungere a una trattazione epistolare, dai toni meno celebrativi e più intimistici. Sovrapponendo insieme classicismo e modernismo, in un alternarsi di distici e quartine non legati a un metro e dalla lunghezza irregolare,

title: The Book Ferret Podcast
description:
The Book Ferret Podcast with Felix the Ferret and Mustela the Mama Ferret. Felix loves ferrets, books, and Pokémon. He is in elementary school and is an avid reader. Mustela has 2 kits and is a lifelong bookworm who has raised readers for over a decade. They volunteer for their public school's equity committee, support public libraries, and advocate for diverse books. They love to curl up with a good book, 30 pounds of blankets, and a warm beverage. Join us to hear what the kits are reading these days and glimpse into the future of the next generation.

The Book Ferret Podcast gives you the inside scoop into the best books available in Children’s literature. Every book we recommend has been approved by our elementary school ferret, Felix. He will recommend the must-reads for today’s kids, parents, and anyone who enjoys a good book. We will suggest three books in every episode. The final book will look beyond the headlines to recommend our favorite children’s books that have been challenged and banned. Join us to hear what the kids are actually reading these days, and you might learn something new. The book ferret podcast is rated E for everyone.

title: The Million Word Advantage
description: Yokwe ("Hello" in Marshallese) and welcome to the Million Word Advantage. Children who are read five books a day prior to kindergarten will have heard 1.4 million more words than children who were never read to. Come read with us!

title: Bunker Creativo
description:
Este Podcast es un diario de viaje, que sucedió en mi interior y de a poco encontré la forma de expresarlo. Las personas que escucharás a continuación son mi inspiración, son conocimiento en distintas metodologías del Autoconocimiento, como lo son la Astrología, el Coaching, Diseño humano,la psicología humanista, la terapia psicocorporal, entre otras. Charlas que nos revelan historias profundas y humanas. Mi Bunker Creativo es la metáfora de mi hogar interno, donde recibo almas auténticas.

Me gusta escribir guiones.

Gracias por escucharnos.

@coaching.sinfronteras

Guión por Mica Coronel

Producido por Sofia Valori

title: Cixemo (audiolibro)
description:
Todos los derechos reservados.

Abogado Penalista nos comparte una de sus grandes obras Cixemo, un libro que discute y analiza el sistema actual del planeta, regido bajo el entendimiento de la cultura que nos ha llevado como sociedad hasta donde estamos hoy.

Todos los fondos recaudados, serán destinados a dos partes: al propio autor del libro y al CIIIDAER una Asociación Civil Mexicana sin fines de lucro dedicada a la promoción de la educación, energías renovables, cuidado del planeta y apoyo a pueblos indígenas.

title: Wandering Minds
description: Hello, welcome everyone to Wandering Minds, a Wandering Minds Publishing Podcast series where I, Felicity Anderson, get to know our authors on a more personal level, discuss their upcoming releases, and whatever else my mind wanders such as interviews on hot topics within creative and artistic spaces. 10% of all book sales are donated to causes and organizations of our authors' choosing.

title: Las Historias Cortas de Javs
description:
¿Buscas relatos breves de ciencia ficción y terror?

Las Historias Cortas de Javs es un podcast sencillo pero cautivador, donde se narran pequeños audiolibros en estos géneros. Sumérgete en historias llenas de intriga, tecnología y seres sobrenaturales, siempre con un toque humilde y cercano.

Si eres un fanático del género o simplemente buscas una forma amena de pasar el tiempo, este podcast podría ser una agradable sorpresa para ti :>.

title: Literarily Trashed
description: We're four sisters who love to read, drink, and talk shit. If you're looking for those random one-off books that aren't in your typical lineup, you've come to the right place. If you like to blast weak female leads, you've come to the right place. If you like to read mentally disturbing, questionable content that keeps you up at night, you've come to the right place. Our exclusive book club is now open to the public. Cheers! And happy reading!

title: The Books The Bag and The Ugly
description: The Books, The Bag, and The Ugly is a show where I, Rhema Meggett, am your host. I discuss a book I have recently read with my listeners and review it; giving it a rating of "in it's bag," or "truly atrocious."

title: Guo Hua
description:
《智慧葡萄园》读书会🍇

一：主要内容

1. 本群主题：读书知识分享群

2. 每月线下：会组织下午茶读书会分享，分享主题、时间、地址等细节，会提前公布大家哦！来不了的家人可以通过语音或视频录制，来接龙参与活动。

3. 每周线上：周日晚上9点由张教授以分享《塔冷通——解读圣经里的现代智慧管理与管理智慧》（以下简称《塔冷通》）一书为主线、以专注《圣经》古老而成功的管理案例如何移植到现代企业经营与管理实际为导向、以“信仰智慧对接财富管理”为目标的互动分享。也支持家人们踊跃报名分享。分享内容我们会进行文章美化和内容审核。可语音、视频或文字来分享。

4.每日线上：每晚9点读圣经接力活动，通过语音或视频录制来分享，诵读圣经篇章：圣咏，箴言，训道，雅歌，智慧，德训，雅各伯书，来接龙参加接力活动，每次接力篇幅要求长度无限制哦！

二：辅助内容

1）进群请改群昵称：圣名+姓名+地区+行业

2）会不定期组织其他活动：如慈善、音乐会等

3）我们有《国桦朗读者》公众号，所有分享的图片、文章、感悟及活动会摘要写进文章发布到公众号里。还有视频号来做活动宣传。

4）商品、场地、资金等赞助商，合作商欢迎大家踊跃自荐或推荐。群成员还请大家一起多拉点我们爱读书的家人。

5）义工诚邀：活动策划组、拍摄剪辑组、音乐制作组，文章编辑组，宣传组、财务组、风控审核组等。

6）最后禁止私自发送负能量图片、文字等形式的宣传品及个人或商业广告，违规者：群主及管理员第一次警告，再犯直接剔出。

三：声明函

§ 自入群时起，本群每个人自动承诺并声明：遵守本群的群规秩序，特别是遵守国家和教会的相关法律法规，群员发言或图文资料不代表本群观点，违规言行完全由当事人自行承担法律责任。

title: Five Trees
description:
Five Trees dances imaginary lines between fiction and non fiction, between the past, the present and the future with a new look at the subjects of "now", "consciousness", "life", "afterlife" and much more.

The story is an exploration of the possible meaning of the 19th verse of the Gospel according to Apostle Thomas through the records of the "Thomas Family" and their album kept up and handed down over 9 generations. Each generation built its understanding of life, it's purpose and it's mysteries on the experience of the prior.

title: Mastering Cloud and DevOps: Learn by listening with Live Projects solutions
description:
Let you understand the following on this prodcast series:

  1. Purpose: The purpose of this podcast is to help listeners master cloud and DevOps skills through live project solutions. By presenting real-life scenarios and providing step-by-step instructions, listeners can gain practical experience in working with different cloud and DevOps tools and technologies.

  2. Benefits: There are several benefits of this podcast, including:

  • Practical learning: The live project solutions presented in the podcast provide listeners with hands-on experience, allowing them to apply the concepts and techniques they learn in a real-world context.

  • Skill development: By working on live projects, listeners can develop their cloud and DevOps skills and gain experience with different tools and technologies.

  • Problem-solving: The live projects presented in the podcast challenge listeners to think creatively and solve problems, helping to build their problem-solving skills.

  • Career advancement: By mastering cloud and DevOps skills through live projects, listeners can enhance their resumes and advance their careers in cloud computing and DevOps.

  • Accessible learning: The podcast format makes cloud and DevOps learning accessible to a wide audience, allowing listeners to learn at their own pace and on their own schedule.

  • Expert guidance: The podcast is hosted by an expert in cloud computing and DevOps, providing listeners with valuable insights and guidance.

Overall, this podcast provides a unique and engaging way for listeners to learn and develop their cloud and DevOps skills through live project solutions.

In her 80 years, she inherited one of the greatest fortunes of Western Europe, married two kings who would fight each other throughout their lives for her wealth, gave birth to two other monarchs, went on Crusade, led a war, spent fifteen years in prison, crossed the alps on horseback in her seventies, raised a king's ransom, and ruled her own lands longer than any other woman except Queen Elizabeth II. This podcast is adapted from the book, Lions' Forge, written by Karen Markle Knab; look for it soon!

title: Backstory Podcast
description:
We will be on summer vacation from 6/18 - 8/26, and will be back with Episode 9 on 8/27, Sunday at 8:00 PM. Thank You!

Everything has a story, doesn't it? And every story has a story behind it, a context, which often turns out to be a cluster of stories. It can even be said that every story is connected to a web of stories that form circumstance. Backstory defined is a story that tells what led up to the main story or plot, especially for a character or situation. It can also be a narrative providing a history or background context for a literary, cinematic, or dramatic work.

Writers of all stripes find themselves ensconced in backstory. Creating backstory on the page, stage, and screen is the stuff fulfilling, engrossing, and satisfying works are made of. Are you inspired to create on the page and want to know more about the nuts and bolts of structuring from a backstory perspective? Do you want a deeper dive into the fascinating world of backstory? You've come to the right place! Tune in weekly starting April 30th and join us every Sunday evening at 8:00 p.m. EST in our informative exploration into the incredible world of backstory.

title: Al Dès Matt
description:
Benvenuti al podcast "Al Dès Matt".

In questo podcast, vi porteremo in un viaggio attraverso la bellezza e la ricchezza della lingua piacentina, attraverso la poesia.

Attraverso la narrazione di poesie locali di tempi passati, vogliamo celebrare l'importanza dei dialetti locali e della narrativa locale.

Siamo convinti che le lingue locali siano una parte essenziale della nostra cultura e della nostra identità

Sono la testimonianza del nostro passato, della nostra storia e delle nostre tradizioni. Attraverso la poesia, possiamo apprezzare la bellezza e la profondità di queste lingue. Il nostro podcast si rivolge a tutti ma soprattutto ai giovani che vogliono riscoprire le poesie locali dei loro nonni e bisnonni. Speriamo che le nostre narrazioni vi ispirino e vi portino in un viaggio nella cultura e nella tradizione della nostra terra.

Grazie per averci scelto e buon ascolto.

title: The Makers of History by Jacob Abbott (Narrated by illacertus)
description:
Explore the dynamic lives of history's greatest leaders in Jacob Abbott's Makers of History series. Witness the genius and ambition of Julius Caesar as he reshaped Rome, and delve into the conquests of Alexander the Great, who carved an empire across continents. Uncover the enigmatic allure of Cleopatra, Egypt's legendary queen who captivated hearts and changed the course of empires.

Experience the early days of the founding of Rome by Romulus, feel the wrath of Hannibal the Carthaginian and bear witness to the madness of Nero. Last but not least ride through the steppe with bow and arrow alongside Genghis Khan on a journey through time to discover the triumphs, tragedies, and enduring legacies of these captivating figures who shaped the world.

title: Fate Points - Audio Book
description:
Fantasy AUDIOBOOK with Full Cast Narration.

5 episodes per week.

  • 60 hours of content already written with 1.5 to 2 hours published weekly.
  • Novel has over 3 million views on Royal Road and 1000s of reviews.
  • Each episode is produced by the author and the characters reflect my vision
  • The entire multiple book series will be published a hundred percent for free.

Synopsis.

The fate of humanity did not rest on Tom, but it sure felt like it. Then again, despite their numbers all the chosen felt the same way.

The trial, the tutorial, or whatever you wanted to name it, was over. After forty long solitary years spent mastering the system, Tom, with his abilities reset was going to have to do it all again to save humanity.

The cost of failure would have an unimaginable impact on his friends and family. His sacrifices had propelled him into the top million, giving him the opportunity to make a difference. And he had a risky plan to do so.

Against their will, humanity had been chosen, and all Tom could do was to work with the system.

Universe spanning gods ran a regular competition on a world called Existentia where they pitted seven species from different universes all of whom have dominated their home planet against each other.

But a straight-out fight would be too simple. Existentia is a living, breathing, impossibly large, magical world with existing empires, secrets, dungeons and trials. The seven races in the current iteration of the competition have their own unique advantages to exploit, but first they have to survive long enough to show their worth.

Fate points is a third person single POV litrpg with a unique system and mechanics and strong, complicated side-characters.

Voices are AI powered but you can barely tell.

If you want to support me advanced chapters are available on patreon

https://www.patreon.com/FatePointsAudio

Or if you want to tip me/ buy me a coffee you can do it via Ko-fi

https://ko-fi.com/fatepoints

title: Leaf by Lantern
description: Fellow Christian artists: join Alicia Pollard in discussing how the eternal Word of God clarifies and beautifies the craft of retelling fairy tales. Whether you are retelling a fairy tale in the form of a novel, play, poem, short story, painting, or opera, the Bible provides the perfect illumination for ethics and aesthetics, morality and mystery. Artists who follow Christ have no better lantern than Scripture for studying and adding leaves to what J.R.R. Tolkien called the "Tree of Tales": the canon of folklore.

title: Towards a Repair Society: Conversations with Peter Erdi
description:
Listen to a series of conversations with Dr. Peter Erdi about his and Dr. Zsuzsa Szvetelszky's new book, REPAIR.

This book propagates a new way of thinking about managing our resources by integrating complex systems theory and social psychology perspectives. By resources, the authors mean objects, such as cell phones and cars, and human resources, such as family members, friends, and the small and large communities they belong to. As we all face the "replace or repair" dichotomy, readers will understand how to repair themselves, their relationships, and communities, accept the "new normal," and contribute to repairing the world. The book is offered to Zoomers, growing up in a world where it seems everything is falling apart; people in their 30s and 40s, who are thinking about how to live a fulfilling life; people from the Boomers generation who are thinking back on life and how to repair relationships. The Reader will enjoy the intellectual adventure of connecting the natural and social worlds and understanding the transition's pathways from a "throwaway society" to a "repair society.

https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-030-98908-8

Welcome to "The Lit Flick Club" podcast! Get ready to dive into the fascinating worlds of literature, cinema, and television as we enter new worlds every Friday. Join me as I dive into the pages of captivating, discusses new movies, and unravels the narratives of binge-worthy TV shows.

Each episode of "The Lit Flick Club” is a delightful mix of lively discussions, insightful analysis, and engaging banter. I am here to ignite your imagination, spark intellectual conversations, and provide you with a community of fellow enthusiasts who share the love for storytelling in all its forms.

Whether you're an avid reader, a cinephile, or a TV series addict, this podcast is your haven. A diverse selection of books, movies, and TV shows, ranging from classics to contemporary works, covering various genres and themes is carefully curated every month. Expect everything from thrilling mysteries and epic adventures to heartwarming romances!

Not only will I share my thoughts and opinions on the chosen works, but I also invite you, the incredible listeners, to be an integral part of the conversation. Through the social media platforms and interactive segments, I encourage you to send in your book recommendations, movie suggestions, and TV show favorites!

Tune in every Friday for lively discussions, insightful analysis, and passionate conversations about the books, movies, and TV shows that leave us spellbound. Let's celebrate the magic of storytelling together on "The Lit Flick Club” podcast!

title: Invaluable: Achieving Clarity on Value
description:
This Podcast is a companion to the book Invaluable: Achieving Clarity on Value, available on Amazon. Join author Somik Raha in conversation with Julius St. Clair on each chapter of the book.

Book Abstract:

In today’s complex world, it can be difficult to make decisions that align with our values. Invaluable fills an important gap in decision-making: of achieving clarity on our values and integrating them into our decisions consciously. You, dear reader, already have unique values waiting to be unpacked and articulated across diverse work contexts. Invaluable offers a holistic framework to aid its discovery, testing and succinct communication. This homage to values is brought out through stories, philosophy, poetry, citizen science and embedded podcasts. By the end of this book, you will have a deeper understanding of your singular values blueprint, making intentional decision-making an enriching process. You will also be inspired to live a life that is true to your values.

title: Holy Unhappiness with Amanda Held Opelt
description: Conversations about the expectations we have of what the life of faith will feel like. Each week Amanda Held Opelt (author of the book Holy Unhappiness: God, Goodness, and the Myth of the Blessed Life) will interview writers, pastors, artists, and friends about the myths we believe about "the good life." Together, we'll reimagine what blessing can look like when we are willing to look beyond our culture's definitions of happiness and success. Here we make space for grief, lament, weariness, and restlessness, trusting that even our unhappiness has something to teach us about ourselves, about God, and about the world around us.

title: No Justice No Peace: The Broken System story of XoAlex
description: No Justice No Peace: The Survival of a Mother & Son in a Broken System Based on the True Story of Sarah Nazorek and her son Alexander Landon aka XoAlex who unexpectedly passed away in February 2022, he was only 16 years old and was fulfilling his future goals of being a Producer, Rapper, and Song Writer. His story is to bring awareness of issues among children and teens and help other parents and/or teens to be more aware of the systematic failures that can result in death and/or long term psychological effects. No Parent should ever have to bury their child or fight for their child to be protected from a system that should be protecting our children from abusers and drugs. His story is part of KeepNMalive.com. My son thought he was going to eat pizza with his ex girlfriend and her mother and he came home in a body bag. Be careful what you smoke it could be your last toke. Let’s change these laws and find everyone in our state who has been affected by losing a loved one to fentanyl poisoning. Also raising awareness that if a parent smokes a deadly substance with a child. There are mandatory sanctions if the victim is dead and cannot testify. Alex was due to testify against the first person who attempted to kill him through drug lacing. Unfortunately he was set up for death 2 months before he was due to testify. This real life story will have you hanging on the edge of your chair. Turning his story and my pain into purpose in changing the state of New Mexico and putting a stop to child abuse and systematic failures in place that hinder the mental health of our future. No child should have to go through failures of the family court system allowing them to be around murderers and drug traffickers. This story is the raw story of the injustices a mother has to go through to protect her child only for the child to end up dying at the failures of the system. Rest in peace to my precious babyboy Alexander. I will not give up we will change this system for future children. You lived such a painful life at the hands of humans who made it harder for you to just be a child and enjoy life.

title: The Sperber Book Prize Podcast
description:
The Sperber Prize Podcast is a show highlighting some of the most influential reporters and journalists around the world through their biographies and autobiographies. Join us as we speak with Sperber Prize nominees to talk about their lives as reporters, their book-writing process, and the state of journalism.

The Sperber Prize is given in honor of Ann M. Sperber, the author of the excellent biography of Edward R. Murrow, Murrow: His Life and Times (Fordham University Press). The book received numerous awards for its meticulous research and finely crafted writing and was a finalist in 1987 for the Pulitzer Prize. Through the generous support of Ann’s mother, Lisa, the prize was established to promote and encourage other outstanding biographies and memoirs related to the field of print and electronic journalism.

title: Liberating Minds Podcast
description:
Liberating Minds Podcast: Unveiling the Truth, Inspiring Change

Join us on the Liberating Minds Podcast as we challenge the status quo, providing a fresh perspective on the struggle against oppression, inequality, neoliberalism, and capitalism in Kenya. In a society where information is never neutral, we refuse to be passive victims of distorted history and censored knowledge.

Delving into Kenya's rich legacy of resistance, our podcast unearths untold stories and alternative narratives that deserve to be heard. Through thought-provoking discussions, we review progressive radical books, explore crucial topics, analyze influential movements, and delve into eye-opening documentaries.

Our mission is to expose the deliberate misinformation and educational systems designed to keep us docile. By questioning and critiquing the dominant narrative, we strive to empower listeners and ignite a collective drive for change. Together, let's embark on a journey to liberate minds and shape a more just and equitable society.

title: Frente al Escenario: Audio Music Drama
description:
Bienvenidos a "Frente al Escenario", un audio drama que te sumergirá en la apasionante vida de Anna, una adolescente del nuevo milenio que descubre su verdadera pasión a través de su primera desilusión amorosa: la música.

Acompaña a Anna mientras narra sus experiencias como bajista de la banda Amnesia y te sumerge en su mundo musical y en las complejidades de la vida en general.

En cada episodio, Anna compartirá anécdotas, reflexiones y lecciones aprendidas en su viaje musical. Desde los momentos de éxtasis en los conciertos hasta los desgarradores desamores, Anna te llevará a través de sus viajes y te hará descubrir lugares mágicos y personas extraordinarias que solo existían en sus sueños.

Prepárate para sumergirte en una historia llena de emociones intensas, superación personal y la búsqueda de la verdadera identidad. Al ritmo de las mejores canciones de rock y punk que se han escrito, "Frente al Escenario" te invita a disfrutar de una experiencia inmersiva que te hará vibrar y reflexionar sobre la importancia de perseguir tus pasiones y seguir tu corazón.

title: Short Story Today
description: A weekly podcast hosted by Jon DiSavino. It celebrates the enduring and compact literary form known as - you guessed it - the short story. But more importantly, it gives listeners an opportunity to hear the work of some of the best emerging writers of today. Each episode begins with an interview with the week's guest author, and ends with a professional audiobook production of a story by that author.

title: Foodie Fusion: Uniting Flavors From East To West
description:
Welcome to our HOLY LAND’S HEAVENLY HOLIDAYS PRESERVING CULTURE THROUGH DESSERTS cookbook. Do you ever wonder why certain recipes have been passed down in cultures and families for generations? Or why something as wonderful as a delicious dessert, can bring a sense of comfort, discovery, and bonding? Food provides sustenance for our bodies, but it's so much more than that.

Having lived in the Holy Land, I wanted to create this unique cookbook for the 2 million Christians whom, each year, perform pilgrimages to Bethlehem, Nazareth, and Jerusalem. There, they can celebrate the importance and joy of perpetuating and discovering the historical cultural rituals and traditions of cooking, baking, and eating. The recipes are not only delicious, but they also serve as a way to connect with one’s Christian heritage and preserve a piece of our important history.

Through baking desserts and also learning about the spices, fruits, vegetables which are of major authenticity, we can learn about our ancestors, their traditions, and the stories behind the meals they enjoyed. Upon returning home from a journey to the Holy Land, pilgrims can also create new memories with loved ones by gathering in the kitchen and working together to create something special.

Throughout human history, food has the power to bring people closer together, to create a sense of community and belonging. Sharing a new dessert you've never tried baking before, is an experience that will be cherished.

So, come explore the cultural significance of desserts in the Holy Land, especially those enjoyed during the Easter and Christmas celebrations. Baking and eating the scrumptious goodies will bring joy, connection, and meaning to connecting with one’s Christian hertiage.

To purchase a copy of each episode’s recipe, stories, and photos, or, to purchase the entire book, Contact : Joeygalata@gmail.com

title: Death of a Salesman || An English Play || By Arthur Miller || Drama Simplified Ep-1
description:
Presenting the First Episode of Drama Simplified Season-1. Play- Death of a salesman (EP 1/20) Playwright- Arthur Miller Simplified By- Shilpi Arora Language- English Venue Partner- The White Crow (BKC) Supported by- Rudra Studio About the play- Death of a Salesman is Miller's tragic masterpiece about Willy Loman, the ageing travelling salesman haunted and driven by empty dreams of prosperity and success. Charting Willy's downfall and tragic end, the play has been justly celebrated as one of the most famous dramatisations of the dark side of the so-called American Dream. Its moral and political purpose is perfectly counterbalanced by a powerful and moving human drama: a man trying to make his way in the world whose human flaws ultimately lead to the shattering of his family and their illusions. The play won Miller both a Tony Award and a Pulitzer Prize and remains as powerful today as when it opened. Methuen Drama's critical editions of Arthur Miller's plays offer a wealth of authoritative and helpful commentary by leading international scholars. Prepared in consultation with the author's Estate, they represent the definitive editions of the works. #deathofasalesman #play #theatre

Designed By: Rishabh Mishra

title: Exploring "Chokher Bali" the novel written by Rabindra Nath Tagore
description:
" চোখের বালি”.

যা কিনা ভারতের অন্যতম উল্লেখযোগ্য সাহিত্যিক, রবীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুরের লেখা একটি মমস্পর্শী গল্প।

1903 সালে প্রকাশিত, এই বাংলা উপন্যাসটি তৎকালীন সময়ের সামাজিক রীতিনীতি, প্রেম, স্বাধীনতা এবং তৎকালীন পুরুষতান্ত্রিক সমাজে নারীরা যে সংগ্রামের মুখোমুখি হত তার একটি চিন্তা-উদ্দীপক অনুসন্ধান উপস্থাপন করেছেন।

গল্পটি বিনোদিনীর জীবনকে ঘিরে আবর্তিত হয়েছে, একজন অল্পবয়সী বিধবা যিনি নিজেকে আকাঙ্ক্ষা এবং সামাজিক প্রত্যাশার জালে আটকে রেখেছেন।

উনিশ শতকের শেষের দিকে প্রকাশিত এই উপন্যাসটি, ঔপনিবেশিক বাংলার একটি প্রাণবন্ত চিত্র অঙ্কন করে এবং ঐতিহ্যগত রীতিনীতি এবং পাশ্চাত্য ধারণার প্রভাব থেকে উদ্ভূত দ্বন্দ্বগুলিকে তুলে ধরে।

বিনোদিনীর চরিত্রটি খুবই জটিল এবং বাধ্য পরায়ন। আমরা যখন তার চরিত্র বিশ্লেষণ করি, সেখানে আমরা তার নিজের প্রতি আকাঙ্খা, হতাশা এবং শেষ পর্যন্ত তার ব্যক্তি-স্বাধীনতার উন্মোচন প্রত্যক্ষ করি।

একটি অনমনীয় সামাজিক কাঠামোর মধ্যে আটকে থাকা নারীদের মানসিক অশান্তির মুখোমুখি হওয়া এই উপন্যাসে নিপুণভাবে চিত্রিত করা হয়েছে।

এই উপন্যাসের মুল কাহিনী লুকিয়ে আছে তৎকালীন সময়ে নারীদের ভিন্ন কর্তব্য এবং ইচ্ছার মধ্যে দ্বিধা-বিভক্তি।

বিনোদিনী সমাজের প্রতি তার কর্তব্যবোধ এবং ব্যক্তিগত পরিপূর্ণতার জন্য তার নিজের আকাঙ্ক্ষার সাথে প্রতিনিয়ত লড়াই করে।

"চোখের বালি"-তে উল্লিখিত সম্পর্কের চিত্রায়নও বিশ্লেষণযোগ্য । বিনোদিনী এবং তার বন্ধুর স্বামী মহেন্দ্রের মধ্যে নিষিদ্ধ আকর্ষণ থেকে শুরু করে বিনোদিনী, তার বন্ধু আশালতা এবং মহেন্দ্রের মা রাজলক্ষ্মীর মধ্যে জটিল গতিশীলতা পর্যন্ত, গল্পটি প্রেম, আনুগত্য এবং বিশ্বাসঘাতকতার জটিলতার মধ্যে পড়ে।

লেখকের এই অভিব্যক্তিপূর্ণ লেখার কৌশল বর্ণনামূলক,

যা পাঠকের মধ্যে বিভিন্ন আবেগের উদ্রেক করে। তার কথার মধ্য দিয়ে আমরা সামাজিক রীতিনীতির সীমাবদ্ধতা এবং চরিত্রের ব্যক্তি-স্বাধীনতার আকাঙ্ক্ষা অনুভব করি। উপন্যাসের সূক্ষ্ম গদ্য মানুষের আকাঙ্ক্ষার সারমর্ম এবং সম্পর্কের জটিলতাকে ধারণ করে।

"চোখের বালি" তৎকালীন নারী ব্যবস্থা, সামাজিক প্রত্যাশা এবং লিঙ্গ ও শ্রেণির কারণে তাদের উপর আরোপিত সীমাবদ্ধতা সম্পর্কে প্রাসঙ্গিক প্রশ্ন উত্থাপন করে।

যার কারনে লেখকের এই উপন্যাস প্রজন্মের পর প্রজন্ম ধরে পাঠকদের কাছে অনুরণিত হতে থাকে, এবং এই বিষয়গুলোর কালজয়ী প্রাসঙ্গিকতা তুলে ধরে।

"চোখের বালি" হল একটি সাহিত্যিক রত্ন, যা মানুষের মানসিকতাকে গভীরভাবে উদ্ভাসিত করে, সামাজিক নিয়ম এবং ব্যক্তিগত আকাঙ্ক্ষার জটিলতাগুলিকে প্রকাশ করে।

বিনোদিনীর চিত্তাকর্ষক গল্পের মাধ্যমে, বিস্বকবি আমাদের ঐতিহ্য এবং অগ্রগতি, কর্তব্য এবং আকাঙ্ক্ষার মধ্যে সূক্ষ্ম ভারসাম্য এবং সীমাবদ্ধতায় ভরা পৃথিবীতে ব্যক্তিগত পরিচয়ের সন্ধানের প্রতি প্রতিফলিত করতে প্ররোচিত করেন।

title: El Poder de la Conciencia
description:
Historias de superación personal hay muchas, así como cientos de libros que prometen revelarte las claves del éxito. Pareciera que es muy fácil acceder a los secretos que necesitas conocer para tener abundancia, poder, dinero. Entonces, si esa información está al alcance de la mano ¿por qué no todos gozamos de los mismos frutos?

Este libro es más que una lista a completar, una historia de vida. Por eso es necesario presentar algo de contexto ya que esto nos ayudará a entender que además de una historia de éxito, es la historia de un ser humano que, en contra de situaciones que podrían verse como desfavorables, logró cambiar su destino.

title: My Name is F-I-O-N-A
description:
Travel down the road with Pat Stewart as she deals with the turmoil and pleasures of modern life.

My Name Is F-I-O-N-A and Other Short Stories includes outrageous opinions, intriguing insights, purely fiction, and odd behaviors perpetrated by family members and other unforgettable characters. A spunky unborn baby learns how to use Morse code to tell her parents her name is Fiona. In another purely fiction story, sit down in a bar on the shady outskirts of Memphis when Patricia steals a kiss from Elvis. Read on to see Patricia’s patriotic camel Joe become belligerent when the President wants to send him to Afghanistan!

Inspired by actual events, Patricia Stewart’s essays reveal how she opened her heart and soul to help Hurricane Katrina-ravaged homeowners. She introduces you to Alicein (pronounced Allison) Wonderland who explains her hippie-inspired name and why she opened her Mockingbird Café in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.

On a more serious note, Negroes into the Schools will take you to a street corner in Little Rock, Arkansas to witness this turning point in Civil Rights history.

You won’t be able to put this book down until you’ve read the last word.

title: Tales From The Grave
description: Welcome to "Tales From The Grave," where spooky stories come to life! Join our host, Whitney, as she delves into the chilling world of both popular and lesser-known tales of terror. Each episode will immerse you in eerie atmospheres, from haunted houses to spectral encounters. But that's not all - "Tales From The Grave" is not just your ordinary horror podcast. Whitney masterfully blends true crime mysteries with spine-tingling fiction, creating a unique and captivating experience. With her haunting narration, she weaves together a tapestry of stories that will leave you with goosebumps and questioning what's real and what's merely a ghostly legend. Dare to listen and let your imagination run wild with "Tales From The Grave" - the podcast that brings the dead back to tell their stories.

title: Cosmic Reader
description:
Welcome to Cosmic Reader, the podcast where we embark on cosmic journeys through the captivating world of science-related literature. In each episode, we delve into books published by science field authors, unlocking the mysteries of the universe through their insightful words.

In this podcast, we explore a diverse selection of books that cover a wide range of scientific disciplines, from astronomy and physics to biology and environmental science. Our cosmic bookshelf is filled with classics, modern bestsellers, and hidden gems, all carefully chosen to ignite your curiosity and deepen your understanding of the cosmos.

Join us as we read and review these literary wonders, uncovering the awe-inspiring ideas and discoveries shared by brilliant minds. We'll take you on an expedition through the pages of "A Brief History of Time" by Stephen Hawking, where the secrets of the universe unravel before your eyes. We'll dive into the enthralling world of astrophysics with Neil deGrasse Tyson's "Astrophysics for People in a Hurry," making complex concepts accessible to all.

In each episode, we'll provide insightful takeaways, exploring the impact of these books on science and society. We'll introduce you to the visionary authors behind these works, shedding light on their contributions to the scientific community.

Whether you're a science enthusiast, an avid reader, or simply curious about the cosmos, Cosmic Reader has something for you. Our mission is to inspire wonder and appreciation for the intricacies of the universe, one page at a time.

Don't miss a single episode of Cosmic Reader; subscribe now and embark on a cosmic journey through the realms of science literature. Together, let's explore the universe and the boundless knowledge it holds."

title: Бул подкаст маанилүү темалардагы татаал маселелерди тереңирээк түшүнүүгө көмөктөшөт.
description:
Эсимде - бул деколонизациянын, иденттүүлүктүн жана репрессиялык режимдердин инсандарга жана коомдорго тийгизген таасиринин көп кырдуу темаларын изилдеген кызыктуу жана ойлондурган видео подкасты. Кыраакы талкуулар, интервьюлар жана эксперттик талдоо аркылуу ар бир эпизод тарыхый жана заманбап көз караштарды берет.

Подкаст эки алып баруучу Гүлзат Алагөз жана Талгат Жумашев жана коноктордун кеңири чөйрөсү, анын ичинде тарыхчылар, окумуштуулар, активисттер жана репрессиялык режимдерден аман калган же колонизациянын кесепеттерин башынан өткөргөн адамдар менен баарлашуу түрүндө болот.

title: Review of my Eastern Orthodox books
description: These books on Eastern Orthodoxy are intended to help readers to understand the lengthy process followed by the Orthodox Church since its formative stage in the first century, passing through the important, and for Orthodox churches, crucial, Byzantine period, to its present day position. By tracing the history of the church in this way and analyzing its spiritually rich doctrine and ethics I will try to show that the contemporary Orthodox Church has a historical link with the original and early Christian community. [Please, excuse any language mistake. English is not my mother language.]

title: When We Fell From Earth
description:
If you wake up to find a brown box with your name on it, waiting for you in front of your doorstep, it is probably us. Or maybe someone who doesn't want you to know that we exist, so take care. Inside this box, you will find recordings, letters, pictures, and probably a half-eaten Big Tasty sandwich. Listen to every recording; read every letter; study every picture; and do not eat the sandwich, because when the time comes, they are your only way of surviving. Skipping pleasantries, even though there is nothing pleasant about what you're about to hear, let's get started.

11 Kings and Queens

10 Evil immortals

2 Ancient Brothers

1 Deadly mission

Enjoying (really not) their life at the German University in Cairo, ten best friends find themselves attacked by a supernatural being and fall, by an elevator, into Arotheman: A world in a dire need of rulers, who, apparently, are them. Drawn into the politics of a once peaceful and magic-rich world, they discover things about each other, themselves, and that their own world is merely a speck in a sea of other worlds. Light and Shadows; fire and Ice; Earth and Wind; Darkness and lightning and water; Magic and time. They all must unit and face the danger that looms over Arotheman and their world: The Elentrances: Immortal beings opposite to everything that is good and beautiful. In every story, good wins, somehow. But what if evil had already won?

A dystopian under world continent with societies that have devolved into a state of oppression, poverty and suffering. A dead body is washed ashore discovered by two boys. From then we learn about a marine biologist who makes a ground breaking discovery of an advanced under water civilisation, but then becomes embroiled in a criminal conspiracy.

title: Udti Patang | A Stirring Story By Smriti Bhatheja
description:
Udti Patang is a beautiful love story, set in the capital of India, year 1969. The story and portrayal is dominantly influenced by the cultural and linguistic approach of Punjab.

The protagonists, Guru and Bani lay out a beautiful display of Love, Compassion, Sacrifice and Accomplishments through out the play.

Other respective characters like the family and friends of the protagonists have very distinctive characteristics and each role adds its own essential value to the play to make it exceptionally distinguished.

There’s drama of course, but it substantially involves emotion of love and romance, aggression and militance with a hint of humour and political semblance of varied personalities and psychologies respectively.

The Stirring Stories, as the name suggests is all about the stories that are fictional but very close to the reality of Life. Every Life on Earth is beautifully full of Drama with a multitude of emotions - This channel just intends to channelize those emotions and stir them up to the surface in form of smiles, tears and goosebumps. Some stories might evoke some memories, some may sound like your own story and some will be just amusing to ears!

title: Principles & Tools of Creation
description:
Hello everyone, welcome to Principles & Tools of Creation Podcast with your host Terry Malatji.

Who is Terry Malatji?

I am a life coach, spiritual teacher, author & educator of Principles & Tools of Creation. I am also a founder of Life with Terry - a coaching, wellness, & education company established to help people create & live fulfilled lives, create effectively & efficiently, and embark on a life journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing.

Purpose of podcast

This podcast was created to talk about Principles & Tools, a subject matter that will help my listeners to create & live fulfilled lives, create effectively & efficiently, embark on a life journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing.

The book Principles & Tools of Creation is a living & a life changing document created to help people remember & manifest their greatness as creators & co-creators. It unpacks the powerful language of creation understood by the universe and available for anyone who desires to become a creator & co-creator of life.

My intention is to help my listeners to fully understand the language of creation and to become the creators & best creators of life.

I believe that I am currently embracing a season that has ignited my highest purpose & passion to use Principles & Tools of Creation to usher human beings to a healed, restored, enlightened & awakened place of oneness and connectedness.

Expect to enjoy fruitful, and life changing topics.

Book available at https://lifewithterry.com/our-store/

To learn more about Life with Terry and to read articles on Principles & Tools of Creation visit www.lifewithterry.com

NB! Please note that Life with Terry have two additional Podcasts: Life with Terry Podcast @ https://rss.com/podcasts/lifewithterry/. Tune in and begin to create & live a fulfilled life.

From Religion to Self Podcast. Tune in @ https://rss.com/podcasts/fromreligiontoself/ and be empowered. Be enlightened and heal from the trauma of religion. Become the creator that you were meant to be.

Our catalog of premium titles, narrated by award-winning actors, includes works by Danielle Steel, Brandon Sanderson, J.R.R. Tolkien, Sarah J. Maas, Jenny Han, Jeff Kinney, and many other leading authors. Since our founding in 1979, we have been a pioneer in the industry and, as part of RBmedia, have achieved thousands of industry honors, including the Pulitzer Prize, Academy Award, National Book Award, Audiobook of the Year, Booker Prize, Hugo Award, and many more.

title: Aprehendiendo la experiencia didáctica, "potenciador de lectura".

Esta actividad le permitirá desarrollar los resultados de aprendizaje: comprende las implicaciones de la validación de productos para la inclusión por parte de referentes poblacionales, y argumenta el uso de los principios del diseño universal de aprendizaje (DUA) en la aplicación de las TEP frente a medios y mediaciones didácticas para la inclusión. Mediante el instrumento creado, "POTENCIADOR DE LECTURA"

title: Tales and Tea
description:
Welcome to the "Tales and Tea Podcast" with your hosts, Shea and Cara! Get ready to dive deep into the enchanting world of books that we all can't stop talking about. From fantastical realms to dark romantic adventures and everything in between, we've got your literary cravings covered.

Join us as we unravel the magic, the mystery, and the mayhem behind TikTok's favorite books. We'll dissect the plot twists, celebrate the unforgettable characters, and explore the themes that keep readers glued to the pages (or screens). Whether you're a bookworm or just looking for your next great read, we've got recommendations that'll keep you hooked.

But wait, there's more! What's a good book without a perfectly paired tea? The girls will also introduce you to their favorite teas that complement the mood and themes of each book. From cozy evenings with a cup of chamomile to bold adventures with a spicy chai, our tea choices will enhance your reading experience.

Expect lively discussions, witty banter, and a dash of laughter as we sip and spill the tea (both literary and literal). Whether you're sipping tea at home or on the go, we're your go-to podcast for bookish insights and delicious tea recommendations.

So, grab your favorite novel, brew a fresh pot of tea, and join us on this literary journey. Subscribe now and let the storytelling and tea pairing begin!

Need more? Make sure and follow us on socials and join our Discord community for even more tea spillage!

Discord

Tiktok

Instagram

Youtube

Happy Sipping!

title: OwlBooks, micro-aventuras visuales para jóvenes soñadores.
description:
OwlBooks presenta una revolucionaria experiencia narrativa diseñada específicamente por pedagogos para niños entre 5 y 12 años: micro-libros en formato de podcast con video. Cada episodio, meticulosamente creado, transporta a los jóvenes oyentes a mundos envolventes a través de relatos breves y cautivadores, complementados con visualizaciones dinámicas y efectos sonoros inmersivos.

Esta combinación no solo busca entretener, sino también educar, aprovechando técnicas pedagógicas que facilitan el aprendizaje y fomentan la imaginación. OwlBooks combina la magia de la narración tradicional con la conveniencia y el atractivo multimedia, ofreciendo historias adaptadas a las necesidades y curiosidades de la audiencia infantil en la era digital.

title: ¡Mujeres Arriba!
description: "¡Mujeres arriba!" Podcast dirigido específicamente a empoderar a mujeres a través de la educación financiera y el desarrollo personal. Utilizamos la Inteligencia Artificial (IA) para identificar, curar y presentar los libros y recursos más relevantes, convirtiéndolos en episodios audibles para las mujeres en movimiento. Más allá de hablar de conceptos financieros, abordaremos la experiencia y las historias detrás de cada libro, ofreciendo perspectivas valiosas para cualquier mujer, ya sea profesional, emprendedora, ama de casa, entre otras.

title: "Voices of Reverence: Stories from the Missionary Path"
description:
Welcome to "The Life of a Missionary" podcast! 🎙️

Join us on a captivating journey as we delve into the extraordinary life of a passionate priest, a dedicated missionary, and a beloved academic. With decades of service in schools, colleges, and parishes, he's not just a religious enthusiast but a true inspiration to all. From his humble beginnings to making history as a pastor in America, he's shared the joys and challenges of a missionary's life. Get ready to be moved by his vivid experiences and life-touching stories. Stay tuned for heartwarming tales that illuminate the path of a devoted servant of faith.

title: Power Energy
description: Power energy, often simply referred to as power, is a fundamental concept in physics and engineering that plays a crucial role in our everyday lives. It is the measure of the rate at which energy is transferred or converted over time. Power is essential for various applications, from electricity generation and distribution to the operation of vehicles, machines, and electronic devices.

title: Terry Pratchett - Thud! (Discworld) Audiobook (Full Audiobook)
description: The Discworld is very much like our own - if our own were to consist of a flat planet balanced on the back of four elephants which stand on the back of a giant turtle, that is . . .'Beating people up in little rooms . . . he knew where that led. And if you did it for a good reason, you'd do it for a bad one. You couldn't say 'we're the good guys' and do bad-guy things.'Koom Valley, the ancient battle where the trolls ambushed the dwarfs, or the dwarfs ambushed the trolls, was a long time ago.But if he doesn't solve the murder of just one dwarf, Commander Sam Vimes of Ankh-Morpork City Watch is going to see it fought again, right outside his office.With his beloved Watch crumbling around him and war-drums sounding, he must unravel every clue, outwit every assassin and brave any darkness to find the solution. And darkness is following him.Oh . . . and at six o'clock every day, without fail, with no excuses, he must go home to read 'Where's My Cow?', with all the right farmyard noises, to his little boy.There are some things you have to do.

title: کتاب صوتی من در هر آنچه میبینم هستم
description:
این کتاب که برای کودکان گروه سنی (ج) تدوین شده، با تصاویر رنگی و جذاب، فلسفه را به زبان ساده برای کودکان بیان می کند. در بخشی از داستان می خوانیم: «خورشید گفت: من و تو یکی هستیم. گفتم: اما من که اینجا هستم و تو آنجا. خورشید گفت: تو نه فقط آنجا، همه جا هستی! از خورشید پرسیدم: یعنی چه؟ چطور می توانم هم خودم باشم و هم تو؟ خورشید خندید و گفت: از ستاره بپرس که خواهر توست. ستاره هم خود توست» کتاب حاضر را نشر «قطره» منتشر کرده است.
